Negative Reviews: Didn't love that sink was actually in room but I understand why they designed it that way.
Positive Reviews: Comfy hostel - beds with lights, sockets, lots of storage. Great shower in room. Nice lounge area. Breakfast available and good value for the spread available. Near metro, lots of places to eat near by - restaurants, bakeries, Lidl supermarket ( can recommend Malaysian restaurant down street). Felt pretty safe with 24hr reception, you have to be buzzed in and show your bracelet which is also electronic key to your room- and friendly staff. And that they have female dorms available is a draw for me. Would very happily stay again!

Review Title: Overall stay was amazing best hostel I’ve been to so far !
Negative Reviews: Only thing I thought was OK was the bars we went to for the bar crawl, not the best but the club was fun. The room shower is small and bathroom sink is outside so if you need to get ready early, everyone will hear you.
Positive Reviews: I love everything about it the staff were super welcoming the facility was centered and you could literally walk everywhere. Taxis were easily accessible if you needed them. Breakfast and dinner all 10 out of 10. The bar at night was a lot of fun and the bar crawl but that was because of the group we had. The room was awesome we had a small balcony looking out into the street.

Negative Reviews: The aircon in the room didn't seem to work too well, and the windows could only be opened by cleaners, so the room got a bit stuffy at times.
Positive Reviews:
I was very impressed by the hostel's general atmosphere and cleanliness - at times it almost felt like being in a hotel.

The hostel is modern, clean, and has decent facilities. The lounge area is a nice place to spend time relaxing or working, the terrace has great views over the north of the city, and the kitchen and restaurant are good too. 

The staff are friendly, welcoming, and knowledgeable regarding local attractions and getting around the city. There are too many to name them all individually, but Pablo's tours (day and night) were great, and all of the staff running the family dinners or managing the front desk (Felipe, Franky, Ana, Eli, and the rest) were lovely too.

The rooms themselves were great value for money. The storage for each bunk was more than sufficient, the beds were surprisingly comfy, and the en-suite showers and WCs were very convenient.

Negative Reviews: Wi-Fi in room didn't work well, I needed to switch to my own data from time to time :(
Positive Reviews:
I really enjoyed staying here for 8 days! I was supposed to stay for a shorter time, but I liked Barcelona and "Yeah Barcelona Hostel" so much I decided to extend my stay :)
Regarding the pros:
- Location, I mostly walked everywhere;
- The hostel itself is clean and nice, the first floor has work space;
- The €5 breakfast was really excellent; fresh breads, pastries, cold cuts, cheeses, oats, fruits, juices. etc. I usually prefer to go to local cafes for breakfast, but in this case I had breakfast at the hostel every day. Only the coffee from the coffee machine was so-so, but for this price it was acceptable.
- There was access to the kitchen and it was cleaned on a regular basis (the problem of kitchen cleanliness is quite common in hostels, but here there was nothing to complain about).
- The hostel organizes club outings and daily dinners, which allows you to meet other people! This is a good place to socialize,
- People working here have nice and friendly attitude, are super helpful and kind!

Overall, I had a pleasure to meet many great people there and would definitely come back again :)

Review Title: Excellent Experience that will make you fall in love with Barcelona!
Negative Reviews: There is nothing I can say here, except that maybe the rooms could have been just a tad bigger. My 4 bed dormitory was very comfortable but did feel a little cramped.
Positive Reviews:
Yeah Barcelona was probably one of the best hostels I stayed in during my 10 week trip in Europe.

The staff are particularly friendly, welcoming and try to make you feel at home. Yeah doesn't feel like a hostel it feels like a friendly hotel in the center of town. It is close to a metro station and the Sagrada Familia.

ROOM: The Air conditioning works like a charm. The shower and WC cubicles are separate inside the room which is convenient for the people sharing the room. The water pressure and temperature in the shower was great!

WALKING TOUR: They offer walking tours in the morning (11am) and I took one on Classic Modernism which was all about Antoni Gaudi. The tour was conducted by Pablo and he did a fantastic job of explaining things to us, keeping the group together, keeping us entertained with his stories and along the way imparting real knowledge as well. Pablo was funny, friendly and cheerful the whole time.

PUB CRAWL: I along with 44 other hostel residents signed up for the Pub crawl one night and it was just marvellous! We went to 2 bars (Mobsters) and 1 club (Sutton). I have not had so much fun in years under the watchful eye of hostel staff who ensured those getting too drunk were kept hydrated and made sure everyone was safe.

DINNER: Yeah offered a fabulous dinner at 12 Euros for a 3 course meal (soup + main course + dessert) and 2 drinks (sangria or draught beer). You can't get that much food at that rate at a restaurant in the city. I choose to eat on Seafood Paella night and the meal was excellent! The portions were generous and the evening boisterous.

BREAKFAST: The value of a good breakfast while travelling on a budget is underrated. The breakfast was 8 Euros if memory serves well and had everything from hot scrambled eggs and hash browns to flaky croissants, dense cakes and various types of coffee (from a machine), orange juice, cereals, cheese platters with manchego cheese and meat platters replete with ham and pepperoni.

Negative Reviews: The shower room could be a bit bigger.
Positive Reviews:
Excellent hostel! 
It's very clean, in a very convenient location, and it has a a floor where you can read books, watch TV or just relax with others.
The dorm rooms are very clean, and there is enough space to fit your luggage and a lot of other things.
You can eat breakfast and dinner for good price.
Last but not least, the stuff is really cool and helpful! 
I recommend it hands down!

Review Title: Excellent stay, warm and helpful staff, comfortable beds.
Negative Reviews: Top beds could have a little curtain too, only the bottom ones have them.
Positive Reviews: Yeah Hostel is super comfortable, an excellent choice. Staff is very warm and helpful, location is perfect, rooms are great and the pool on the roof is very charming. I was working some days and the wifi is great, besides having plenty of places to sit and work from. Breakfast is also amazing and well worth the price! Bonus feature: the lockers for the luggage under the bed are huge!! I could fit my big luggage open inside.

Negative Reviews: Thin walls and party music in the night, could be very noisy, though we're ok with that. Another thing to mention is that the double bed is VERY HIGH. For someone shorter as 160cm it might be hard to get on, but we found a small ladder in the closet which helped us solve this small issue.
Positive Reviews:
Perfect location! Walking distance to many famous attractions like Casa Mila and Casa Batllo. The metro station is 5 min walk away, plenty restaurants and supermarkets nearby. The room is also very clean, staffs are very nice. The breakfast buffet (which is included in double bed room reservation) is also nice, you can make pan cakes on your own and it was delicous : )
For it's price it might be the best room at this location. We had a great stay in Barcelona and would recommend it to everyone!

Review Title: Awesome hostel, great people and good location!!
Negative Reviews: The only complaint I have is that the tile is very slippery getting out of the shower LOL
Positive Reviews: Great location, friendly staff! The beds were really comfy and it was nice and quiet at night, with the option to go out on the night tour with the other guests! The dinner was awesome to meet people and socialize! Lots of great food options nearby too and metro was really easy to use! The walking tour by Mario was a lovely bonus! He took us to the Modernist buildings in the area and explained the recent history of Barcelona very well! You can really tell he is passionate about his city and loves his home, and it really makes you love Barcelona too! Thank you Mario, I learned so much from you.

Negative Reviews: We didn't get a lock for room storage
Positive Reviews:
Staff were friendly. They let us use facilities before check-in time.
It was clean, nice looking.
They have extra-paid breakfast and they often go clubbing at night.
The location is not that far from Sagrada de Familia.

Review Title: A modern friendly hostel - you will not be disappointed!
Negative Reviews: My only recommendation is the main lighting in the room could be improved with more spot lights as it was a little dark at times to see but this didn't affect our stay.  It was lovely.
Positive Reviews: We stayed in a very clean comfortable private room on the 6th floor and it was one of the best hostel's I've stayed in. Each bed has ample USB/plug to charge all travelling essential devices. The location is great, close to some main tourist spots and metro is 3-5 min walk.  There are some cute little restaurants and Tapas bars on same street.  Staff are extremely helpful and I can recommend the free walking tour with Leonardo. Dinning area and kitchen is very funky and the hostel has a set 3 course dinner (inc drink) each evening for just 12 euro's...great portions and is a bargain!  I would definitely stay here again.

Review Title: An excellent stay and an excellent hostel.
Negative Reviews: Whilst I appreciate the safety concerns, the locking of the windows at night does make the room quite stuffy.  Maybe there could be a solution to allow at least a certain amount of ventilation during the night?
Positive Reviews:
Certainly  Yeah is a hostel a cut above the rest and whilst a little more expensive than others, it is worth the extra money.  It is bright, clean, full of good energy and has an attractive and  relaxing lounge, great kitchen and a lovely roof terrace.  The location is convenient and it's easy to get to a lot of the main attractions on foot or the excellent Barcelona public transport system.  The rooms are spacious and bright, the beds well thought out with lots of storage.  The mattresses are bliss, quality, deep and comfortable.  I slept like a log.  Each dorm has it's own shower and toilet which is a big plus too.

The people staying were predominantly at the younger end of the scale but there were folks of all ages staying which made the whole place feel inclusive.  I'm in the middle age band and didn't feel at all out of place.  There's an exceptional breakfast available at reasonable cost, as well as an evening meal.  There are activities including guided walks and bar crawls, for those who wish.

Finally the staff.  Brilliant, each and every one them.  Bright, cheerful and helpful, especially to a foot weary traveller arriving a bit overtired and not really with it!

I highly recommend this Yeah Hostel.  And I'll be back there very soon.

Negative Reviews: I was in a 4 bunk room, and on our floor each room had it's own bathroom rather than a communal floor bathroom. At first I like this, but it was a little awkward in practice. We had a room for a shower, a room with a toilet, and the sink was in the main area of the dorm. This meant if we had different schedules, using the bathroom, washing hands, and/or getting ready outside of day time hours could be quite noisy. There are other bathrooms on different floors, which I used to get ready when I had to get up really early, which was ok, just a little awkward. Otherwise, I really liked the place.
Positive Reviews: Great location in town with lots of easy access to transportation, attractions, and restaurants. Offers food, but I didn't order anything from the hostel. Nice longue area on the 1st floor. 24 Hour reception and friendly staff. The bunks had storage drawers under the bed, which were well oiled and thus quiet (nice when sharing space with others). The bunks also had a small shelf with a light and plugs (both prong and usb), which could be closed and locked with your own lock as well.

Negative Reviews: Pool area was a little boring. Could get nicer if there were some sun beds and decorations.
Positive Reviews: Convenient, comfortable, clean and very nice staff who were happy to give advise on how to get the most out of my Barcelona stay! Decent breakfast. Good dorm rooms with possibility to lock in your belongings.

Review Title: One of the best hostels I've stayed in! Worth a visit!
Negative Reviews: Showers could be a little bigger as are only place to change and not very big!
Positive Reviews: Really lovely hostel. Very sociable but also space to unwind alone. The room is airy, good air con, and comfortable. The breakfast and dinner are excellent value for money and a chance to socialise with other guests. All stsff friendly and approached. Location is a 15 min walk to the central gothic district and the area is less touristy so nice to explore too. Easy bus to Park Guell.

Review Title: The hostel is cool, confortable and well located.
Negative Reviews: The upper beds did not have curtains. The washing machine and drier prices seemed a bit expensive.
Positive Reviews: The staff is friendly and helpful. There are activities organised by the hostel liek the city tour and the dinner workshop. The hostel is very clean. The beds were confortable, and the lower beds had curtains for privacy. The lovkers are very big. The shower and sink are inside the dorm. The terrace is big and the vue is good. The location is good as there are a lot of bars, cafés and supermarkets around. The breakfast was nice. The luggages are tagged before putting them in the luggage room.

Negative Reviews: The house keeper. Went straight into my room even if I told her I was resting and didn't want her to make noise. She did the cleaning with some chemicals so I had to leave the room immediately so I don't breathe that in.
Positive Reviews:
The hostel has a great location for exploring all of the attractions of the city. Metro is near by and is an excellent way of transportation.
The activities are well organized, I loved the city tour with Leo. The dinner was also great.
The staff at the reception was really friendly and helpful.
Loved the lounge area and the comfy bed in the dorm.

Review Title: Would come again, definitely a place to stay.
Negative Reviews: I didn't like that the bathrooms are in the same room, they are not noise isolated and you can hear anybody using the sink as its just open in the room. Makes it hard not to wake anybody up if you have to leave early.
Positive Reviews: The location was nice, staff is very friendly and open to give suggestions. The lounge area is cozy, the beds were fine. Breakfast and dinner was really good for its value and quality was also superb- totally would recommend.

Review Title: Brilliant hosts, amazing staff and facilities. Highly recommend!
Negative Reviews: The charging ports next to the bed can be a bit temperamental and the top bunks do not have curtains so unless you’re on the bottom bunk, privacy is a tad compromised. They only have a couple basic games in the lounge, not a great selection if you’re a board game enthusiast but there’s so much else to do that it doesn’t really matter honestly.
Positive Reviews: The best hostel I’ve ever stayed at! It’s very social, so if you go to the dinners or the night tour it’s very easy to make friends. The pub crawl host, Zoe, is phenomenal! All of the staff are really friendly and have great energy. The lounge area is super comfortable too and rooms are quiet if you need some downtime. The location is good too - only a couple minutes walking from the metro. Clean, spacious, well-maintained and overall a great choice to explore Barcelona from, especially as a solo traveller.

Review Title: Brilliant hosts, amazing staff and facilities. Highly recommend!
Negative Reviews: The charging ports next to the bed can be a bit temperamental and the top bunks do not have curtains so unless you’re on the bottom bunk, privacy is a tad compromised. They only have a couple basic games in the lounge, not a great selection if you’re a board game enthusiast but there’s so much else to do that it doesn’t really matter honestly.
Positive Reviews: The best hostel I’ve ever stayed at! It’s very social, so if you go to the dinners or the night tour it’s very easy to make friends. The pub crawl host, Zoe, is phenomenal! All of the staff are really friendly and have great energy. The lounge area is super comfortable too and rooms are quiet if you need some downtime. The location is good too - only a couple minutes walking from the metro. Clean, spacious, well-maintained and overall a great choice to explore Barcelona from, especially as a solo traveller.

Review Title: All round. One of the best hostels ive stayed in.
Negative Reviews: Rooms are quiet and comfortable, however, ours was very narrow. There's only a few feet between dorm beds and the wall. There was nowhere to sit to get dressed/put trainers on if you had a top bunk. Barely room to get dressed at all, which leads onto the same issue with shower space, it is nice and hot and clean but very small. The shower curtain was only one foot from the door so was pointless to use. The door had pegs but they were small or broken so nowhere to get undressed/dressed privately or hang any clothes/towel in a mixed dorm with strangers. It was also quite dark in the room, I didn't mind this but it meant I was using my mobile torch to access my belongings underneath the bunk beds even in the daytime.
Positive Reviews: Clean, comfortable and modern. Lounge, bar, kitchen, toilets, slow elevator...all available. 'Super' friendly fun staff offering morning walks, night bar walks and great value breakfast and dinner. Very secure with 24hr reception too. Location is great, 5 mins from av.diagonal, another 5 to pg.de gracias. A metro stop is 1 block away, this has amazing value deals and also goes direct to Camp Nou if you are intending to go visit there or to watch an fc Barcelona match. Would definitely recommend and would stay again

Negative Reviews: The bathroom is very small, with a very small dry area to change clothes.
Positive Reviews: The staff is amazing, specially Fran and Pablo who did everything to make the guests confortable. The food is wonderful, the room is very confortable and clean. Internet is very good, the location too, the locker is big, and the hostel is very safe. The hostel is so cozy that sometimes i didn't want to go out :p

Review Title: What you see is what you get.. the perfect hostel in Barcelona..
Negative Reviews: The check-in time was at 15:00 and my room was not ready.
Positive Reviews:
This hostel is what says exactly in the description. Clean and Tidy hostel in the perfect location.
The staff was really helpful. The breakfast was great. All went well

Negative Reviews: There is no area to change clothes in the bathroom and a bath mat in the room would help to wipe the feet after a shower. Rest everything was great :)
Positive Reviews:
The cleaning was done regularly and the staff was very friendly and helpful. The beds are comfortable to sleep and the lower bunk beds have a curtain to block the light (if roommates are getting ready to party and you want to sleep) :p
The breakfast was great at 5 euro price. The dinner option was great and they have an amazing chef at the location! I would definitely recommend.

Negative Reviews: You couldn't open the balcony door to let some fresh air inside the room. The conditioning system worked well, but still not enough sometimes, so it would be nice to use this option as well.
Positive Reviews: It was my first hostel experience after quite a long time and everything was just perfect! Clean rooms, comfy beds. The staff were friendly and very helpful, the breakfasts were totally worth the money, you could even make yourself pancakes. The location is superb, 5 Minutes walk to a subway station and around 10 minutes to Passeig de Gracia and Sagrada la Familia.

Negative Reviews: They kept putting (almost) only men to my room, so most of the times I was the only girl there
Positive Reviews: The best beds and staff, amazing social dinners and very good location, walkable to many places or if you don't feel like walking, public transportation is very close, too.

Review Title: A very nice hostel at a great location. Would book again!
Negative Reviews: The sink in our room had a leak, so the floor in the bathroom and part of the hallway was constantly very wet. Also the top bunk beds had no handle to hold on to while climbing into bed. This made it relatively hard to get in and out of bed and i can immagine that it would even be a little dangerous for a child to get up and down. Also the top bunk beds had no curtain (the bottom ones did) so all light from roommates was visible.
Positive Reviews: Excellent location close to the metro station. The staff was very nice and everything looked very new and neat. Our room and the hostel were very clean. The hostel also organises a walking tour based on tips which was absolutly great! There is a dinner for 12 euros every night (3 courses + 3 drinks) with a fixed menu, I would reccomend paella night!

Negative Reviews: The showers. Change the curtains please with some solid doors because the water goes all over the place when you shower… The only flaw I found in this hostel.
Positive Reviews: Clean, friendly staff, very good location close to Sagrada Familia and metro station. Loved the night tour !  Cheap dinner and breakfast. Very good food.

Review Title: Excellent for a short solo trip
Negative Reviews: the upper bunk bed was a little hard to access and didn’t have curtains. the sleeping area and bathroom area could use better separation
Positive Reviews: Exceptional dinners, great roommates, excellent staff, superb location, design

Review Title: All around terrific hostel but hot rooms
Negative Reviews: The room with 6 of us in it got incredibly uncomfortably hot. When I went in to pack up at 10am I started sweating the moment I walked in the dorm. The AC did not go on ever unfortunately although there are vents. The window to the room is locked closed and only opened during the day which also didn’t make sense with this issue.
Positive Reviews: The location is terrific, the people there, staff and guests, are very kind respectful and fun. Everything was very clean and the common areas were sleek and functional. Dinners are delicious and cheap for what you get and the pub crawls were fun!

Negative Reviews: Air conditioning could have been better.
Positive Reviews: Staff are very welcoming. Location is within walking distance to a number of attractions and metro stations. Rooms are kept clean. Organised dinners and walking tours every day (most days?) are a must for your first day.

Negative Reviews: There is no sandales for use in the bathroom
Positive Reviews: Location staff room breakfast

Negative Reviews: Shower in room a bit small, bit pricey for a hostel
Positive Reviews: Amazing staff, central location, good dinners, nice rooftop, clean rooms, ensuite in rooms

Negative Reviews: The balcony doors are opened and shut by the cleaner am and pm. I didn't mind this, but would have appreciated being told at check in that this was the plan
Positive Reviews: The friendly staff, comfortable and clean rooms, location, food offering

Review Title: Perfect hostel, perfect location, perfect staff. Yeah yeah yeah!
Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Perfect location for the hostel with the most amazing staff. Start your day off right with an all you can eat breakfast buffet for less than €10 before heading out for a walking tour of the city with the knowledgeable staff who also offer amazing facts about the city and suggestions of where to visit, looking at you Pablo! Explore and return to the hostel any time of day with a 24/7 reception and plenty of lounge/shared areas for you to enjoy time outside of your room, including the rooftop pool and bar! Family dinners are a staple, sign up for three courses with you fellow travellers and gorgeous food cooked by the talented chef Fabio, before Wesing whisks you away for a pub crawl around some of the hidden gems of the city. A perfect place to stay.

Excellent location in the heart of Eixample, 15 min walking distance from Sagrada familia, metro station nearby, good bus network (both day and night). Far from tourist crowds, but close enough to everything. Beds were super comfortable. I liked having the shower inside the dorm room, so no need to go outside in the common corridor. There was also a room for working with WiFi and plugs, the wifi allowed to take work calls. The staff organise amazing 3-course dinners for a very cheap price, the food is cooked on the day and tasted just excellent. Highly recommended!

Review Title: You would like to come back!
Negative Reviews: * My stay was short :-)
Positive Reviews:
* The location within walking distance from the metro station
* Friendly and helpful stuff
* Breakfast - big choice :-)
* Silent bedrooms, you could not hear the neighbor
* Shower, sink and WC in the bedroom
* Aircondition
* Chill out place in the lobby
* Terrace on the top of the roof

Location was great. Walking distance to paseo de gracia and metro. Facilities were cute and clean. Room was clean and nice. Very good neighborhood with restaurants and even cinema in front. Staff is very friendly and helpful.

Review Title: It’s totally worth it and I would recommend everyone to stay at yeah hostel.
Negative Reviews: Chill area can have small sports activities such as fusball table or something like that.
Positive Reviews: Rooms were quite spacious and toilet and bathroom in the room makes it very convenient. Staff is good and arrange various activities such as walking tour, bar and pub hopping and get together dinner which really helps provide opportunities to make new friends and have a great experience overall. Also, metro station is quite near and connectivity is very good.

Negative Reviews: Everything was amazing
Positive Reviews:
Incredible hostel, I enjoyed my stay there so much! The beds are extremely comfortable, it was impossible to get up, the staff is awesome, very kind, helpful, friendly and a joy to be around, they always had some organised events, mutual dinner (for a very affordable price, unfortunately I didn’t get the opportunity to try this, but other people at the hostel said that the dinner is awesome, delicious and filling) and tours in the city, pub crawls etc, the location is also very good, very close to the metro and main attractions. I enjoyed my stay in this hostel to the fullest and would love to stay there again at the earliest possibility ❤️ would definitely recommend.  People staying there are very cool as well :)
I also loved how there’s all the facilities for people with disabilities.

Awesome staff, awesome rooms, crazy views from the terrace and the food at night made by the chefs in the hostel are super 👌 . Pud crawls are a MUST if you want to see some of the night life and super close to the metro aswell. 100% recommend for the traveler who wants to see Barcelona and enjoy what it has to offer.

Review Title: Perfect hostel, perfect location, perfect staff. Yeah yeah yeah!
Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Perfect location for the hostel with the most amazing staff. Start your day off right with an all you can eat breakfast buffet for less than €10 before heading out for a walking tour of the city with the knowledgeable staff who also offer amazing facts about the city and suggestions of where to visit, looking at you Pablo! Explore and return to the hostel any time of day with a 24/7 reception and plenty of lounge/shared areas for you to enjoy time outside of your room, including the rooftop pool and bar! Family dinners are a staple, sign up for three courses with you fellow travellers and gorgeous food cooked by the talented chef Fabio, before Wesing whisks you away for a pub crawl around some of the hidden gems of the city. A perfect place to stay.
Location, breakfast, spacious rooms and common areas, activities, friendly staff, organized accommodation

Negative Reviews: Everything was amazing
Positive Reviews:
Incredible hostel, I enjoyed my stay there so much! The beds are extremely comfortable, it was impossible to get up, the staff is awesome, very kind, helpful, friendly and a joy to be around, they always had some organised events, mutual dinner (for a very affordable price, unfortunately I didn’t get the opportunity to try this, but other people at the hostel said that the dinner is awesome, delicious and filling) and tours in the city, pub crawls etc, the location is also very good, very close to the metro and main attractions. I enjoyed my stay in this hostel to the fullest and would love to stay there again at the earliest possibility ❤️ would definitely recommend.  People staying there are very cool as well :)
I also loved how there’s all the facilities for people with disabilities.

Review Title: This is my first solo trip visiting Barcelona and feels at home
Negative Reviews: There is nothing I disliked. I wish I could have stayed longer.
Positive Reviews: Very nice hostel at the heart of Barcelona with excellent service, great location within walking distance of attractions, comfortable room, public area were very clean and comfortable to stay in! The staffs were amicable, kind, and helpful. They have the best dinner event (best chef) that creates an opportunity to socialize with others and the best walking tour every day.

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: I really enjoyed this place! It was one of the best hostels I've ever stayed in. The bed was really big and comfortable. The location was good enough and there is a subway station nearby the hostel. The staff were really cool and friendly. Also, they organize many great events daily like pubcrawls, dinners, walking tours and so on. I highly recommend to sign up for a dinner and a pubcrawl, you won't regret it 😉 It's worth saying that there is a lovely terrace on the top of the roof with a small swimming pool. Even though it's not deep enough for swimming in, it is a really cool place for chilling out with beer or sangria and making new friends. I hope I'll stay here on my next vacation 😊

I liked that the place was centrally located and had quick access to the metro and the bus stop. 
The room was clean and pretty spacious.
The hostel has free walking tours arranged by the hostel staff and even arranged relatively cheaper dinner, this is a plus for someone planning to travel alone since you will definitely end up making friends with the group that is staying at the hostel at that time. 
They also take all safety measures required to make the stay safe and secure.

Left this place yesterday and I already wanna go back. :( Staff is super friendly, daily walking tours where you can meet new people, lovely dinner in the evening with great hosts and an awesome lounge where you can get some work done, lounge on a giant bed, watch a movie if you want. The view from the rooftop is amazing, got more pics of that view than of the Sagrada Familia haha. Showers and toilets in the dorms are seperate so you don't have to wait as much, which was great. Will definitely be back soon! Thanks for the tour Leo!

Very nice hostel. I booked a bed in a 4-bed female room for 3 days and I had a very good staying there. I had quiet and polite neighbors, the room was clean, and the bed was very comfortable. The staff is nice and is always there for you if you need help. The location is very good too - close to the city center and main attractions, there are many grocery stores, cafes, and restaurants nearby. There is a bar on the ground floor that works in the evenings and it provides a great opportunity for hostel residents to get to know each other.
I especially liked how clean was the kitchen, and the fact that the beds have curtains.

Everything was perfect. The location was amazing, close to every major attraction. Facilities were super clean and everyone from the stuff was super friendly and willing to help you. Definitely recommend grabbing a dinner at the hostel and doing the pub crawl afterwards. I met so many people and had a great time! 10/10

Review Title: Great hostel and will definitely come back soon
Positive Reviews:
I loved this hostel for these reasons- 
1. Super convenient location. 3 minute walk to the metro stop, 1 minute to the bus stop. All the touristy locations at walking distance. 
2. The place was super clean. The cleaning staff was superb and they came in daily to restock the bathroom amenities. 
3. The food was great. I had one dinner (paid 12 euros) which included a soup, paella (both seafood and vegetarian) (one of the best paella’s I had) and a custard dessert. Great breakfast options too (I heard it from a fellow traveller)
4. The storage space was huge. It easily could fit a huge bag and a cabin bag along with that. It had a side area near the sockets where we could keep phone and essentials while sleeping. Great addition to it! :)
5. The bed was comfortable and they also provided extra sheet and a blanket.

Review Title: The hostel exceeded our expectations. Everything was amazing and highly recommend it.
Negative Reviews: Nothing. The hostel met all of our expectations.
Positive Reviews: Food was amazing and great value for money. Staff were attentive, friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean, spacious, modern and quiet. The location was super central and close to all the main sights. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay.

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: They gave me great directions on different ways to get there before I arrived along with costs and times.  The location is great with the metro, buses and within walking distance of many things.  They offer an amazing breakfast and a dinner for a reasonable price. The only ATM that gave me a fair rate and no fees was right around the corner.  The bottom b beds of the 4-bed female  room I was in had curtains, and all beds had lightsand a plug .  The staff was friendly and helpful.  They’re is N elevator. The room had a separate toilet and shower rooms with the sink outside. They’re was an adjustable makeup mirror attached to the wall, plus a mirror over the sink and a full length mirror. You could use the kitchen and store food in the fridge.  There is a for pay laundry. There is a tiny pool and you could sit on the roof.  The trash cans were emptied daily.

Negative Reviews: I loved everything, I'd stay here every time I visit Barcelona!
Positive Reviews:
The location was amazing, right near Metro stations and closed to attractions and great food spots. All the staff were welcoming and friendly - Pablo does great walking tours in the morning which make the experience so much better, as it gives real meaning while you're exploring. 
I was in a 4 bed dorm and the bed was really comfy, spacious and felt like my own private room with the curtain. The hostel overall was quite and peaceful at night, I slept well every night

Very cozy and clean with an opportunity either to buy at a reasonble price or to cook your breakfast. A small pool on terrace and amazing common zone to work or to chat or to read a book at. Room is nice and shower is clean and working properly. Large box for your suitcase. Friendly staff at the receprion and the bar, besides they have some activities likt going our for a walking tour. The location is very close to metro station and in a walking distance to Sgarada familia, which is good for tourists. Many caffees around. There were construction works in teh streets nearby during my stay, so it was a bit noisy when in the streets, but not inside the room. Guests are also polite and of different age, so thre's always someone to chat with. Will definitely stay there again.

Review Title: Great Location, helpful and friendly Staff!! 100% recommended
Positive Reviews: Great location with many bars and restaurants in the area. Helpful and friendly staff! Confortable beds and clean rooms. Definitely a place to stay again. Nice Bar! Tip for travelers: bring your own padlock. There are two safe places where you can keep your backpack or luggage and another smaller with a socket and usb on your bed. so all good! 1 toilet and shower inside the room! visit the terrace to see the skyline! Recommended!
Staff were super friendly and welcoming. Room was very clean and beds comfy. Location was also excellent. Very close to a few touristic spots. Good options of bars and restaurants nearby.

Negative Reviews: Nothing at all.
Positive Reviews:
Everything was amazing. I received warm welcome from David and Soraya when i first entered the building. Location is very good. 200m to Verdaguer metro station. Staff was so much friendly. 
We had a fun with Mario during our walking tour inside Barcelona. He is an expert to give summary hundered of years history in 7-8 minutes. Amazing breakfast with fair value. Everything was fresh and delicious. Unbelievable dinner is served by the Chef Charles. Vegetable soup was really really delicious. 
One big applause to my roommates, i never heard noise from them ever.

Everything was excellent! The location, very friendly and nice staff, clean rooms and delicious food. I really liked the guided tour with Pablo and get-together dinners with other nice travellers :) Thank you for making my stay in Barcelona so amazing! :)

Negative Reviews: The lift was a bit unpredictable. Sometimes it would take you up when you wanted to go down. It also would often take more than 5 mins to arrive. Its minor and I did take the stairs once or twice but I was on the 6th floor
Positive Reviews:
I met so many incredible people. The beds were super comfy and the lockers were massive for my bags (bring a lock). Ensuite shower in my room was great!
Great location. near las Ramblas, lots of supermarkets and restaurants nearby and the metro station very close by. I felt safe in the area.
The staff were lovely! I loved the dinner in the evening, €12 for 3 courses and 3 drunks. It was a great way to meet people. The walking tour with Mario of the Gothic Quarter was a great way to start my visit to Barcelona! The rooftop pool was a highlight for me. The perfect spot to relax in the sun.

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: The hostel is a nice cozy and trendy  hostel located in proximity to most of the tourist attractions . The rooms  were clean and well maintained with all basic amenities in place. The staff were super nice and  always willing to help and guide you . The breakfast spread was excellent with a variety of in-house freshly baked croissants.😋. They organise a 3 course  dinner every night  at the bar with drinks( just 12 euros) which is a great opportunity to socialize with other hostellers !. We also did a walking tour  to the gothic quarter with Pablo who was super fun and entertaining!. overall a perfect stay in a beautiful city..

Room is good, location too, 
Soraia was lovely but one of the guy of the staff whom I do not remember the name and probably for the best  tried to charge me 10 euros for a bar crawl which was originally 15 with some free alcohol and I did not want to drink. justification from the staff was "we are already paying for the club".  I  ended up not going on the bar crawl and made some friends and I ended up in the same club than the people from the bar crawl, club was free of charge... 
Good hostel and some good staff, but some others clearly have questionably ethics..

Negative Reviews:
Beds at top level can use some curtains for more privacy and blocking the light

The size and also the height of the beds can be bigger.
Positive Reviews:
Very charming environment and very friendly staff  homey lounge, big equipped kitchen,several grocery stores close by, close to subway station and walking distance to some of the attractions.
Rooms getting cleaned everyday.

Negative Reviews: room was a little dark but didn’t spend too much time in there.
Positive Reviews: Friendly staff, warm and welcoming. we had an amazing walking tour with Leo! great location and comfy beds and shared spaces.

Negative Reviews: Overall I was really happy with my stay and the value for money. Suggestions for possible improvement: additional step/handrail for the upper bunk bed, as it's tricky to get up and down, a curtain for the upper bunk bed for additional privacy/blocking out light if sleeping in day, occupied/not occupied signs by each bed, so you know if someone is behind the curtain or on the upper bunk trying to sleep (can't see to know!), better lighting in the toilet/mirror area, a more powerful hairdryer, an adjustable shower hose instead of one fixed in the ceiling, and a larger shower cubicle area so you can dry your feet properly and dress before leaving the shower cubicle. Also, a partition between the bathroom/sink area and the bedroom would make things less disruptive for those trying to sleep.
Positive Reviews: Really friendly vibe, made loads of friends! Very helpful staff, plenty of facilities, clean soft bedsheets and comfy mattress, great location in walking distance of attractions, safe and affordable. Would come back!

Review Title: Calm hostel in the center of Barcelona
Negative Reviews: The top beds in the shared room don't provide a curtain for privacy, eventhough the lower beds do. The promotion of hostel events (if there are any) is not very visible.
Positive Reviews: The location is very central and well embedded. Also the rooms are tidy and clean providing all the basics backpackers need (working lockers, wifi, common area,...). The staff speaks English.

Negative Reviews: Was all good maybe could have blinds for the top bunk beds.
Positive Reviews: Super friendly and helpful staff. Clean, great facilities and good location.

Review Title: Great hostel, really clean, friendly staff.
Negative Reviews: The lock in the toilet in our room was broken. It could be opened only from the outiside, so if anyone got stuck while nobody else was in the room… it would’ve been a bit traumatic. It was fixed after 2 days.
Positive Reviews: Great location in a calm neighbourhood, rooms and common spaces were very clean, staff was friendly. :)

Negative Reviews: The only drawback is that in room with 6 ppl, it is difficult to sleep as some arriving during the night, or leaving, and it noisy. But it is hostel, so no complains
Positive Reviews: The location is really cool, close to all sights, the hostel it self comfy with kitchen, rooms nice and clean, the personal also friendly, even though u travel alone its well organized and ppl have space to communicate. The guys from hotel provide city tour, so u can get to know ppl and have a company.

Negative Reviews: The size of the room was far too small... we couldn't even open our suitcases without taking the suitcase outside.
Positive Reviews: Cute, centrally located and there's really nice lounge / kitchen areas. Cleaning staff came every day and the balcony was a huge bonus!

Negative Reviews: Just to be picky, the stairs for the top bed are a bit difficult at the beginning, but second day you will master them.
Positive Reviews:
Best hostel I’ve been to! - 

Beds were good, very spacious storage below the it to keep the suitcase and also you have a little space on the top of your bed to charge your phone & have some water, very handy.

Everything was clean, AC on summer is really appreciated, Lounge and terrace are lovely and I was probably lucky to have nice roomies. The staff was friendly, especially Felipe. Location was great, felt safe walking around and also two metro stations + busses around.

They host some tours and events but unfortunately I couldn’t join any, they seemed fun tho.

Negative Reviews: Was all good maybe could have blinds for the top bunk beds.
Positive Reviews: Super friendly and helpful staff. Clean, great facilities and good location.

Review Title: Hip, youthful urban hostel with great amenities.
Negative Reviews: The shower stall was quite small, to the point where you'd be touching the curtain when taking a shower.
Positive Reviews: This is one of the most "fancy" hostels we stayed at in Spain. Great location in north Eixample close to the metro, 24-hour desk staff, 2 large common areas (dining room, lounge), cool decor and furnishings. We didn't sign up for any meals there, but they seemed very good from what we saw. A great hostel option for young travelers who enjoy social activities and partying (they have weekly bar crawls), though it was never noisy. The room was spacious, and the under-bed locker drawers were more than large enough for our suitcase and bags. There was also a table and 2 chairs on which to sit and place items.

Negative Reviews: Bathroom in 6 bed dorm a bit small. Wash basin a bit difficult to control water's temperature.
Positive Reviews: Spacious cabinet for big luggage. Clean and comfortable. A working space on 2nd floor is great. Staff so friendly and helpful. Dinner is superb.

Negative Reviews: The bathroom inside the room is not nice, we can't sleep properly when people wake up to use the toilet or even get ready to go.
Positive Reviews: Everything was great, the bed was comfortable, the facilities in the hostel are very good, and the Staffs are very kind and helpful. The tour that the hostel do is amazing to meet people and the city. The hostel is close to many restaurants, the metro, the bus, and very close to Sagrada Familia. Was great

Negative Reviews: Door latch for the bathroom in my room was defective (the nub in the door doesn’t retract all the way when you turn the knob causing it to get stuck in the latch in the door frame). Everyone in the room agreed it was best to not close the door all the way.
Positive Reviews: Amazing hostel with an awesome vibe overall. The group dinners and walking tours are great ways to meet people. Pablo was a great tour guide and dinner host! The breakfast (5 euro) is a good value for what’s offered. The bed and pillowcase were both very comfortable. This was my first hostel experience and it set the bar really high! Other than an issue with the bathroom door lock this place was everything I could have hoped for at a hostel.

Negative Reviews: Our bathroom has a fould smelling odor coming probaby from the drain.
Positive Reviews: The provate room for four is spacious enougj for us who have huge luggages.  The staff are all very friendly, welcoming and helpful in tending our needs and concerns.   The hostel is very near by walk or train going to our itinerary.  They make really really good croissants and pastries for breakfast.

Review Title: Great place to be, even long term
Negative Reviews: The pillow was too flat for me and I didn't like the fact that the bathroom in the room is split so there's a small room with just the toilet but the sink is outside in the middle of the room so when somebody used it, it would be noisy and I had to wash my face and stuff in the dark to avoid waking other people.
Positive Reviews: The hostel is great, so pretty and well thought out. Common areas are spacious and cozy, the staff is fun to be around and there are many activities planned. There's the option to have dinner and breakfast there every day. I really liked the room, the bed was comfy and you have a lot of locker storage and a privacy curtain.

Review Title: Great place to be, even long term
Negative Reviews: The pillow was too flat for me and I didn't like the fact that the bathroom in the room is split so there's a small room with just the toilet but the sink is outside in the middle of the room so when somebody used it, it would be noisy and I had to wash my face and stuff in the dark to avoid waking other people.
Positive Reviews: The hostel is great, so pretty and well thought out. Common areas are spacious and cozy, the staff is fun to be around and there are many activities planned. There's the option to have dinner and breakfast there every day. I really liked the room, the bed was comfy and you have a lot of locker storage and a privacy curtain.

Negative Reviews: Room was a bit hot at night so harder to sleep. No curtains around the top bunks either to keep light out
Positive Reviews: Very clean and great facilities at property. Good kitchen and free bread and cakes! Didn’t buy breakfast but it looked amazing. Staff and friendly and helpful

Negative Reviews: The room has no ventilation, apart from when the cleaners would leave the balcony door open, but this would be shut before nightime. This meant that at night in the dorms, it would become really stuffy and hot. It would be great if there were some small windows that could be opened/closed by guests.
Positive Reviews: A fantastic hostel! The staff were all super helpful and friendly. The room was comfortable and clean. We enjoyed the breakfast in the morning, which can be bought for a small cost and also went on one of the bar crawls, which was very fun! The hostel is a 15 minute walk away from Sagrada Familia and a useful metro stop. There are quite a few nice restaurants around, including an incredible Ramen restaurant which had queues outside every night.

Negative Reviews: Bathroom in 6 bed dorm a bit small. Wash basin a bit difficult to control water's temperature.
Positive Reviews: Spacious cabinet for big luggage. Clean and comfortable. A working space on 2nd floor is great. Staff so friendly and helpful. Dinner is superb.

Review Title: I am happy I have chosen this place for my stay in Barcelona and I recommend it.
Negative Reviews: The faucet under the shower was somehow broken and it was difficult to choose the right temperature of the water - was either very cold or too hot. There was also poor ventilation in the bathroom causing mold growing on the ceiling. I could tell it was taken care of regularly but still the black mold is not a good thing. Also the tap water had strange taste, even though I was told it is drinkable without cooking I could not stand it. It would be nice to add in the room description that it's useful to take own lock to the storage place in the room.
Positive Reviews: Room was big enough for 6 people. I liked very much the curtain on the lower bad which allowed some privacy. Rooms were far away from the main common space which means no noises could reach the sleeping area. Location was good, I could walk to almost every interesting place in the city, only to the furthest I had to use a public transport but the metro and train stations were very close by. A very friendly and supportive team is a big plus. Nice entertaining program like common dinners and pub crawls. I guess in the summer there should be even more including using the nice roof terrace with a small pool.

Review Title: I recommend visiting the hostel, only there are small things that are not comfortable in the room.
Negative Reviews: The top bed doesn’t have curtains but the bottom bed does. So there is less privacy and the light shines directly to your face. Sink is in the area of ​​the room and not separate, so when someone uses it, it makes a lot of noise. Also shower is very, very small so it was a bit problem to change clothes.
Positive Reviews: Interiour of hostel was nice and friendly - especially the common room. Location is great - it’s near by metro and Sagrada Familia. Staff is super friendly and in the hostel are party dinners, toures etc. - so it’s a great opportunity for someone who wants to meet people.

Negative Reviews:
The sink could be in a different room than the beds.
Wifi could be better on the 5th floor.
But other than that everything was great
Positive Reviews: The stuff was really helpful and friendly from the beginning. The hostel has a rooftop with great view. The neighbourhood is really safe so it's great for solo travelers. They have a different 3 course dinner every evening. The rooms are clean and bad comfortable. There is a common area where you can chill and work at the desk.

Review Title: I totally recommend this place - I had an amazing experience!
Negative Reviews: The light in the room from the common lamps was very dim - consider if you could make it brighter. And also - it would be great if you can state somewhere in your profile that the padlocks for the lockers and the towels should be asked on the reception upon arrival because you are not going to find them in the room for you and that they are not included in the price.
Positive Reviews: Clean rooms, tidy big beds with a curtain to completely make you feel in your own "room". The breakfast was great (also for the value of money). The staff was super friendly :) One of the best things is the location. This hostel is great and safe for female solo travellers.

Negative Reviews: All very minor things: a bit difficult to climb the upper bunk (sort of missing a handle on one side), cannot open the windows by oneself. Like the shower and toilet in the room but the sink was separate so that it was difficult to be quiet when returning in the late hours. I was a bit surprised no one asked for proof of vaccination or negative Corona test results. Elevator was a bit slow but no issue for me :)
Positive Reviews: The hostel was super clean. Staff was very friendly. They organize a 3 course dinner almost very night where it’s easy to get to know people. Very sociable but could also just hang out in quiet. AC was great. Pool on the roof was nice to chill. Convenient location near a metro. Great value for money!

Review Title: Will definitely stay again to this property.
Negative Reviews: Windows are closed at night - to avoid noise from the main road, but there is AC inside the room.
Positive Reviews:
Staff - very friendly and accommodating. They are always willing to help. Shout out to Soraya - many thanks.
Buffet Breakfast - Loads of choices for €5. Hot food, bread, pastries, fruits, cereals. Hot drinks and cold juices included. It will fill you up for the day ahead.
Room - very comfy bed, mattress is so thick. With locker everhead for personal belongings. Powerful water from the shower any time of the day. Always clean and tidy room. 
Location - 3-5 minutes walk to the nearest metro station - Verdaguer. Walking distance to Sagrada Familia and a lot of good places to eat nearby. Supermarket in front of the hostel.

Review Title: We had only one night in Barcelona but I would have easily stayed longer as Yeah was very convenient and comfortable.
Negative Reviews: nothing
Positive Reviews: Staff is awesome, room was clean and comfortable. the common rooms are very nicely decorated and very convenient. breakfast buffet was great. Metro station is just a short walk.

Negative Reviews: Everything were good.
Positive Reviews: It exceeded my expectations. Great interior of public areas. Exceptional breakfast and dinner. Friendly receptionists. Excellent old city guide Pablo and for modern places Mario. Comfy bed. Convenient location.

I truely enjoys this hostel … from the  staff to the breakfast ,from showers to The beds and of course the excellent aircon needs a special mention .. & location!!!  everything makes this hostel one of the best in the world 

I high recommend

Fantastic location.
Amazing , friendly staff.
Nice room with bathroom.
Good breakfast.

Loved the hostel dinner. A great way to meet other people ! The rooms were clean. The staff was very nice and helpful. The location is great also (very close to La Sagrada Familla and about 30 minutes bus ride from Park Guëll).

Review Title: Will definitely be staying here again next time I visit Barcelona, and would recommend to anyone.
Negative Reviews: Nothing - couldn’t fault it
Positive Reviews:
It was in a great central location. My room was bright and clean, bed was comfy with a little privacy curtain and plenty of storage underneath.
Staff were very friendly and helpful - especially Pablo. The hostel provides an unlimited buffet breakfast for 5€ which was great, and even better was dinner (3 courses for 12€). For my first solo trip I couldn’t have picked a better place to stay.

Negative Reviews: Everything was perfect
Positive Reviews: It was my first time in a hostel but for sure won't be the last. I highly recommend it because everybody was amazing and friendly. Very clean, safe, I never locked my things and I was feeling absolutely fine with it. They are very organized, really nice food and great location

Staff is really welcoming and kind really !Very nice place. Beds were confortables. Nice breakfast
Well situated near many attractions

The staff was super friendly, the location was great very centric, great price, it was clean. I loved that the hostel organizes a lot of activities, like walking tours, dinners, pub crawls. I loved Leo's walking tour.

Review Title: Awesome stay. One of the best hostels ever!
Positive Reviews: Amazing infrastructure, food, staff, cleaning, location! Everything worked just perfecly! Loving and cheerful staff. The dynamics of the hostel works for both for the moments you want to keep your time as well as enjoy to meet new people. I would come back for sure!

Everything was perfect. The people who work there are all very friendly and helpful (hi, Pablo), breakfast and dinner were delicious and cheap, the rooms were extremely clean, the beds comfortable, the hostel is in a convenient location and there is even a rooftop. Great stay!

Review Title: Overall an excellent experience thanks to the wonderful staff.
Positive Reviews: Clean premises, very good location friendly and helpful staff members.  Great value for money considering it's location.  Moreover, it offered a great breakfast buffet selection for only €7 per person which is definitely worth it.

The crew of the hostel is amazing. Everybody is so kind and helpfull. Carlos the chef cooked us amazing food and the nighttours with Jake were amazing! The beds are comfortable, the location of the hostel is great and I loved the rooftop for the sunsets. 
This hostel is great to meet a lot of people, but you can also find your peace there. 10/10 for sure!

The staff is very kind and friendly, hostel also has very nice common room. Location is good, it has everything in nearby (supermarket, bakery, fast food, nice restaurants), close to the Sagrada Familia, but the La Ramba is not that close
The staff was very nice and helpful. Rooms were very clean and comfortable with private bathrooms. Food was tasty. Nice location, close to subway. Have literally no complaints.
Cool place. Nice location. It was very clean and the staff were very friendly. Also I really enjoyed the dinner and the pub crawl

Review Title: I had wonderful time there. The staff was amazing. I really recommend this hostel.
Negative Reviews: Everything was perfect. There was nothing that I disliked
Positive Reviews: The location was great. You could walk to almost everywhere. For example it is only 10 minutes far away if you walk to La Sagrada Familia. The staff was very helpful, hospitable and sincere. They were always eager to help me when I needed. I had really wonderful impressions during my stay there. Mario and the chef Fabio were great guys that now I remember to say thank you. Breakfast and dinner services were quite satisfactory. I prefered to eat at the hostel instead eating out. Although it was boiling hot outside the air conditioners really good inside so the weather was not a problem for me while I was sleeping. They kept the hostel clean all the time. I would like to thank the cleaning staff as well. The bed was comfortable and the sheet was clean. You can meet new people if you want. Because they organize the activities such as walking tours with the people who stay at the hostel at reasonable price. I didn't join these activities because I had arranged some tours online before I checked in there. But I witnessed the enjoyable preparations for the city tours at nights while I was having my dinner with joyful services. The lockers were big enough to put our suitcases in a proper way.

Negative Reviews: Everything is perfect
Positive Reviews:
The location is great, Stuff are verd helpful. You can sign up for dinner and have a great experince on socializing with people. Also hostel provides tours. 
We had 1 room for 4 people, our towels were changed every day.
We all love the atmosphere, the services, how helping were workers with our questions and requests. We are happy to stay in your hostel!
friendly staff. Nice and clean rooms. Good breakfast. Good location.

Review Title: Great hostel in a good location.
Positive Reviews:
The place is very chilled, the dorms are very clean and the curtains have privacy. The toilet and showers are clean in the room. The common room area is nice and relaxed and it's not as loud, a nice comfortsble atmosphere. 
The breakfast is good value at 5 euros where it's all you can eat eg pancakes, cereals, breads, coffee etc. 
Staff were very friendly and special mention to Mario who did the walking tour. He was very informative on the tour, answered all our questions and had a very friendly manner. The location is also very close to the metro.

Review Title: More like a hotel! Great hostel!
Negative Reviews: nothing, exceptional hostel!
Positive Reviews:
I enjoyed the room  - it was more like a 2 bunk bed hotel room. I  was surprised by the size and in-room bathroom and toilet. The breakfast for 5 euro was exceptional - buffet style, a big choice, yummy food. 
The staff was very friendly and helpful. 
The roof top patio is very nice place to chill and meet new people. 
The bathroom was great - hot water, clean. 
Really, one of the best hostel I have stayed in. It is not that central as some others, but I felt safe coming back as there is a subway station next to it + there are lots of late night cafes, so when you go home late, there are many people on the street. Enjoyed my stay, 10/10!

Negative Reviews: Pool was freezing and tiny but we didn't expect much.
Positive Reviews: Staff were friendly. Breakfast was great 👍 Hot shower was fabulous 👌 great location, close to metro, some good restaurants close by. Excellent value for money.

I loved the comfortable beds and the layout of the hostel. The included dinner was so so yummy! the chef made some of the best food I had on my entire 5 week trip to europe! I definitely recommend joining the dinner while staying here as it tastes great, is a lot of fun and super cheap! the staff here were super, super kind and so helpful! I believe it was Carlos who hosted the dinner, I forgot his name, but he made everyone feel super welcome! the location is also fabulous!

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Everything was amazing, room clean, comfortable bed with privacy. Clean and wide bathroom. A lot of activities. Friendly staff. Location close to bus stations and metro as well as by walk to many spots and restaurants.
Friendly staff, great day and night tours, social dinners and breakfast, great location, comfortable beds and clean rooms. Very nice hostel, I've enjoyed my stay.

Negative Reviews: Nothing.
Positive Reviews:
Staff is very cheerful and awesome. Especially the people in the reception. Stayed in a 6 bed room. It was very clean. They have tours too and highly recommend that as well. Convenient location. Pillows are one of the most comfortable once I have ever had. Bed was comfy too. Very friendly hostel that has a great vibe and they maintain a nice friendly culture.
 Breakfast was good.

Staying at this hostel was such a lovely experience. The staff was super friendly, the room was spotless and quiet, and the location was excellent. It was easy to socialise with other guests during dinners and breakfasts that they organise every day, but you can also easily relax in the common areas by yourself. I would highly recommend staying here!

Review Title: Great stay for a group of friends
Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Great location, good food, nice staff and clean room

Review Title: Love the city and loved my stay at Yeah!
Negative Reviews: Not applicable
Positive Reviews:
I liked that the rooms were sanitized every day (not including bed, which was fine as I was only there for 4 days and they do it every 5 days).
Location was great. Easily walkable to many sites but also super close to the metro which was very easy to use. 
Lots of nearby restaurants and convenience stores.
Quiet street and friendly staff.
The breakfast in the morning was great and well priced.
Check in was simple and they accommodated my late check in. (3 am as there counter is 24 hours)
Friendly & helpful staff, €12 dinner & €7 b'fast are good value, USB ports by bed  are convenient, near metro station.

Review Title: Cleanest, most effective hostel with probably the best location
Positive Reviews: amazing location, the property was exceptionally clean and honestly some of the best people (staff) I met. the hotel conducts its own in house activities (tours,pub crawls, dinner nights) and is a super place to meet new people. Location was unbelievable, so convenient to the Metro as well as most landmarks!

Review Title: perfect place to stay for solo traveler of any age.   Highly recommend. Great place
Negative Reviews: zero
Positive Reviews: The staff all welcoming and helpful.  Did I say fun?   Very clean- highly recommend breakfast and dinner there.   DELICiOUS!  Beds comfortable. I was able to rest BEFoRE checking in ON a bed in a great common Room with luggage locked up. See feet in photo!!Location great-close to Sagrada Familia.  You won’t be disappointed! GO

The rooms were very clean, the staff were friendly, good location that was close to bus and metro stops and the breakfast was nice and good value for money. We also could check into our rooms earlier than expected which was a benefit.

Review Title: Yeah Hostel provided a fantastic first hostel experience with friendly staff, comfortable accommodations, enjoyable soci
Negative Reviews: People that snore should be banned from using hostels using an internationally recognized system!!! This is not the hostels fault. Thankfully I have noise cancelling earphones so I could manage, but not everyone does.
Positive Reviews: This was my first hostel experience and I think I couldn’t have picked a better place than Yeah Hostel. The staff is super friendly and welcoming (thank you to Felipe who greeted me and made me feel welcome), rooms and facilities are comfortable and clean. The mattres is thick and comfy, and big enough for someone 2m tall. :) It’s also great that the shower, toilet and sink are separated in the room, making it possible to be used by more people at the same time. I liked the organized dinners and pub crawls as I managed to meet new people and socialize. A special mention to Wesing for being the coolest pub crawl host. (I sing, you sing, Wesing - I’m not sure that’s how you spell his name 😂). The dinner is great value for money at just 12 euros for a 3 course meal and several drinks. A big portion of paella was the highlight, which was tastier than one I got served at a restaurant a few nights after. The breakfast is also great at 7 euros for an all you can eat style buffet. You can even make your own pancakes! I also needed an iron to help with the inevitable wrinkled clothes while traveling and they have several available for lending. A laundry area is available too at 1 euro per washing or drying. The rooftop pool area seems great for chilling although I didn’t get to utilize it because I wanted to maximize my time out in the city. Lastly, the location is great as it’s in the center of the city, so you are as close to Park Guell as you are to the beach, for example.

Negative Reviews: The WiFi connection was unstable at times
Positive Reviews: Comfortable bunk beds with bedside sockets and a large locker drawer, while each room is equipped with a private shower and private bathroom. Spacious common area with exceptionally friendly staff. Located on a quiet street between the city center and Gracia, with easy access to 3 metro lines and within walking distance of many sights, restaurants and bars.

Review Title: Yeah Barcelona Hostel is great, has a central location and the staff is very helpful
Negative Reviews:
The only thing that bothered me a bit because I was very tired and wanted to have some rest, was that it was a little noisy in the evening from the kitchen. My room was on the floor right above the kitchen.
I owe apology to the reception for not returning the key. I had it on my wrist but was in the hurry to take a taxi to the airport /Younes woke me up at 6 am and called me a taxi, my phone was stolen at La Sagrada Familia/ early in the morning and I saw it already in the taxi. Sorry for that, it happened unintentionally. I would recommend to Yeah to ask for a deposit - so it will be sure that the guests return the key for sure. Thank you for the trust but things happen sometimes. I promise to return the key by my next visit to Barcelona because it is 100% sure that I'll stay at Yeah again. Thank you, guys!
Positive Reviews:
The room is spacious, WC is separate from the bathroom which is an advantage when there are 6 people in the room. I received the promised bottom bed. They have an elevator - very important for disabled people and the staff helped me with the luggage to the room. The luggage depository is a very good idea, otherwise, you have to look for a place where you could leave your luggage before you are checked in and use the time for sightseeing. I booked now a hostel in Bologna and they warned me that the hostel does not offer this service which is very inconvenient for travelers. Besides, they don't offer 24-hour service at the reception. This is not the case with Yeah Barcelona Hostel. Well done, Barcelona!!
They are all very good but SORAIA at the reception is special and very professional. She helped me to get my boarding cards and I am very grateful for her kindness. Btw, they all speak excellent English. Communication is perfect.

Negative Reviews: Some things feel a bit outdated. The elevator is super slow, the bathroom was cleaned daily but because it was old and a bit rusty it didn’t feel super clean. Also the dryer did not dry my clothes so I wasted like 9 euros only to have to go across the street to the laundromat - which I recommend over trying to do it at the hostel. But it was still a solid hostel! These are just little things.
Positive Reviews: I loved the spacious luggage storage, the privacy curtains on the bed, the activities and tours, and the overall atmosphere. I did a walking tour with Pablo who was great and very fun! All the staff were nice and helpful. ( & I attached a pic of my view of the peaceful neighborhood it’s located in)

Negative Reviews: The price  for a bed in a shared room was a bit too expensive.
Positive Reviews: Great location, kind welcoming staff, clean rooms and bathrooms.

Negative Reviews: You can’t open the windows of your room
Positive Reviews: Great atmosphere, free walking tour, staff is very friendly, beds are very good and a great location.

Review Title: Affordable beds within walking distance to most Gaudi sights.
Negative Reviews: The beds at the top bunks didn't have privacy curtains, only the bottom bunks did.
Positive Reviews: It's a great location, with sights like Casa Mila and Casa Batllo within 5-10 minute walking distance. All the beds had two USB ports, an electrical outlet, a personal light and a small shelf. Bathroom and shower was in the room for the 6 people to share. Everyone I interacted with at reception was nice and helpful, and I left my bags there after check-out for free with no trouble!

Negative Reviews: Rooms and toilets very small.
Positive Reviews: Friendly staff, good location, very comfy beds.

Negative Reviews: Insufficient lighting in the room
Positive Reviews:
I simply enjoyed my stay here. 
Staff was very friendly, location amazing, only few minutes from Sagrada Familia. The atmosphere was so nice. Also bed were super comfy. I definitely recommend this hostel.

Review Title: It was fabulous and made Barcelona that much better
Negative Reviews: Dark room, didn’t know when roommates were coming and going
Positive Reviews: The staff, community, lockers under beds and centralized location!

Review Title: Value for money in a great location with really helpful staff
Negative Reviews: room lighting.
Positive Reviews: location, cleanliness, staff

Negative Reviews:
they don’t have curtains in all the beds, curtains not only helps to have some privacy but also helps if someone comes late and turn the lights on. 
and the internet is quite slow.
Positive Reviews:
I like they have tours during the day and at nights. 
the location was 4 minutes from the metro station. 
the place was very clean. staff is very friendly. 
they storage your bags if you need and they don’t charge you extra.

Review Title: One of the best places to stay for solo travellers
Negative Reviews: Nothing negative to say but NO curtains on the top beds!!!!!
Positive Reviews:
It was my first time that I stayed in a hostel,  so I would say that the staff was lovely, sociable, helpful and nice. The hostel was super clean and the beds were so comfy.
Good location just less than 5 mins to a metro station. WI-FI was perfect. The last thing is that it was value for money to be honest 😂💴.

Negative Reviews: Somehow the house keeping throw away my shampoo and shower gel (which obviously they're not emty bottle), and turns out I have nothing to use in the last night, which is quite sad.
Positive Reviews: the room is clean and comfortable, staffs are nice, the the location is incredible.

Negative Reviews: Just that the room didn’t have that much light, it was kinda hard to organize my suitcases without good light
Positive Reviews: The location was excellent, the place and beds were confortable. Big plus for letting travelers leave their suitcase before and after check-in, the staff was very friendly and nice

Negative Reviews: The price is too high for the 4 bed room.
Positive Reviews:
The room is very clean and the location is very close to the subway. 
I really like their safety control. the door can only be opened by the staff.

Negative Reviews: Privacy curtains are only on the bottom bunks, not the top bunks.
Positive Reviews: Friendly staff, clean, good facilities and location.

Negative Reviews: I really can't think of anything negative during my stay. I had a fantastic time!
Positive Reviews:
Location is great, right in the centre and just a block from the nearest metro station which makes travel so easy.
Staff were always really friendly and helpful. If you want to meet people it's really easy at night with some fun nights out if that is your scene. If not I found that the hostel is quiet and restful in the rooms, which is a nice balance.
Facilities were great with ensuite bathroom and shower.
It all adds to the ambience of Barcelona which is an amazing city!

During my trip to Barcelona, I stayed at three different hostels in the same price range, and YEAH hostel surpassed the other two by far! I couldn't find anything I didn't like about it. The rooms were cozy, sunny, modern, and clean. The hostel is exceptionally well-maintained, and everything appears brand new. There were numerous activities available, from day tours to evening pub crawls. I joined the pub crawl one night, and despite the large crowd of around 30 people, our guide did an amazing job managing the group. Oh, and I must mention the delightful pink pool on the rooftop!💕 The location is fantastic, and the staff was extremely helpful. I highly recommend this hostel.

Review Title: couldn’t of asked for anything more, was such a lovely place to stay!
Positive Reviews: just amazing! staff super friendly and was really clean. great space to chill outside of room and perfect location… Best Trip!!

Review Title: The hostel made my Barcelona trip memorable.
Negative Reviews: None noted.
Positive Reviews: I like the hospitality of the staff, the cleanliness of their facility, and its easy access location.
The location is amazing, many sights are in walking distance. The rooms are quite spacious and clean. The staff was really friendly and helpful.

Spacious and clean room
Proximity to Barcelona central area with good metro connectivity
Very helpful staff

Spacious and clean room
Proximity to Barcelona central area with good metro connectivity
Very helpful staff

Negative Reviews: all good
Positive Reviews:
friendly staffs, good roommates. If you like clubbing you can ask reception if there any parties available, it was super fun to hang out and party with people who’re also staying in Yeah hostel. Location is also very nice, it’s not really close to the metro station but it’s walkable and the neighborhood is very safe even in the night.
The storage space in the room is the best part, it could fit my 26 inches baggage and remember to bring your own lock but you can also buy it from the reception.

The hostel is 2km away from the city center.  The metro station is a 5-minute walk away.  The staff is very friendly and everyone speaks English.  A shared kitchen is available.  The common room is on the first floor and is large.  On the top floor, the roof has been adapted into a terrace, with a swimming pool.  The rooms are cleaned every day and look like in the pictures.  Everything is wheelchair accessible.

Review Title: A pleasant stay right in the center of Barcelona
Negative Reviews: The upper bunk was a bit too close to the ceiling
Positive Reviews: Very good location, friendly and helpful staffs, great facilities, rooms and bathrooms are always clean

Hostel is situated in a very good location. Walkable distance to major attractions. Metro is just 3mins away. Staff are friendly, room is clean and spacious with attached toilet & shower. Price is 👍 as well!!! Hostel offers free tours & nights out for those whom like yo party.

Everything was more than I expected. First Time staying in a hostel and They set the bar really high. Best bed I’vr ever slept in when I was in vacation, staff really friendly and helpful, security on point, great location (we found a nice place to Take coffee and a sandwich for only 2.5€ near by). For sure I’ll choose to stay here again if I’ll come back to Barcelona!

No complaints at all really! Staff were exceptional. Shared spaces were kept clean. Rooms were clean and comfy. The pub crawl was super fun, and the hostel is in a pretty central location. Also did the guided tour, which is based on tips, and Leo did an incredible job.

Review Title: exactly as advertised and pictures are very accurate
Negative Reviews: nothing
Positive Reviews: Very friendly staff, great location, nice facilities, and very clean.

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Everything about this hostel is amazing, the room was very clean, the facilities were great, the location was brilliant but most of all the staff were amazing..everyone was very helpful and accommodating and we felt extremely safe and welcomed..the whole vibes was great and we would definitely recommend

Spacious and clean room in a location that was close to the heart of the city and its attraction. Staff was also friendly and provided useful recommendations to better explore the city. Pleasant experience overall!
