Negative Reviews: Nothing each time I come to Barcelona for business I book the Yeah hostel and it is perfect for my kind of stay
Positive Reviews: The spacious rooms with wooden floors, clean showers and comnfortable beds, the location close to the trendy Eixample and boho Gracia. Special mention to all the staff very helpful and professionnal
Friendly and helpful staff, clean facilities and a good location.

Negative Reviews: nothing, everything was awesome!
Positive Reviews: facilities were amazing, room was large, friendly and helpful staff, great location

Negative Reviews: I could not stay longer :)
Positive Reviews: Every staff member is incredibly kind, helpful, and conscious of keeping people safe. Sofia explained all systems thoroughly when I arrived. Mario, Pablo, Carlos were amazing hosts! Crystal, who guided pub crawls, was sure to make sure that everyone was and felt safe, she was very personable. The entire hostel is very well maintained and much more safe than most hostels. They have several systems in place for guests and their security. The beds are very comfortable and the shared meals were also SO good! There is a lovely rooftop pool with a bar and great views. Be sure to go at sunset. I am so happy I stayed here, and I would recommend to book this hostel.

Negative Reviews: Nothing!
Positive Reviews: I don’t think I can fault this hostel! The rooms were comfortable, with plenty of privacy for the beds and lots of room to lock away belongings. We also loved having the bathroom in the room itself. The terrace and pool were great for hanging out, the staff were always friendly, and the location was really convenient for exploring Barcelona.

Review Title: Overall it has been the best hostel I have stayed in.
Negative Reviews: I used the dryer onsite and the dryer didn’t dry and took a long time.
Positive Reviews: It was in a great location near La Sagrada Familia. The dorms were very clean and beds comfortable as well. I liked that they had large storage spaces for your luggage, just need to bring your own lock. They did a night pub crawl which was super fun! Also the staff is very helpful and welcoming.
The staff is really nice and helpful, the rooms are very quiet and comfortable, the location is awesome and close to the most visited places in Barcelona
super clean and in good location. also as a solo traveller safety is key for me, and the staff and facilities have been amazing. 10/10 recommend.

Negative Reviews: Can't go on the rooftop after 21h. But that's ok (must ve for security).
Positive Reviews: Excellent Location, right inside L'Eixample, 5 minute walk to metro station. This hostel is very good, spacious, clean. The staff were the best - very friendly. The hostel has great amenities, awesome rooftop with a cute little pool!

Review Title: My stay at Yeah hostel was awesome!
Positive Reviews:
The location was great, it was close to everything and the train station was very close also.
The rooms were clean and the ac worked which is amazing.
The staff were nice and very accommodating! 
I especially loved the fact that this hostel is social and loves to party but it is not disruptive if you would like to have a night in and get good sleep; the party is there if you want it.

I booked this hostel twice this Euro trip and next time I go to Barcelona, I will book again!!!

Negative Reviews:
In principle it is nice that the shower, toilet and sink are separated, but the sink actually produced quite some noise when the water was running, which I could clearly hear as there is no door between the sink and the beds. Also the upper beds did not have curtains, so when someone put on the light or opening the window curtains this could disturb my sleep.
Finally, it appeared that the city tour was not included in your stay, and that giving a tip was more or less required. Of course this is fine, but just be clear about it on the website.
Positive Reviews: Great atmosphere in this wonderful hostel. The staff was very friendly and had great suggestions for food in the neighbourhood. The breakfast was amazing, be sure to try it out! It was a pity that my schedule allowed me to only take it once. The city tour was also fun. The rooms are good as well, with a lot of space under the bed to put your luggage in and lock it.

Review Title: Highly would recommend for the experience of meeting people, but hostels in general not for me.
Negative Reviews:
Not really to do with the property but my experience as it was first time staying at hostel I realised it’s not for me. I like my creature comforts and personal space. 
First night I arrived people were already sleeping and someone was snoring all night and someone came back from a night out at 2am and proceeded to have a shower and flood the bathroom as I discovered at 4am when I went for a wee. The next night I came back after 3:30am and tiptoed into bed and was woken up by people getting ready at 7am, slamming doors, cupboards and getting ready with no regard for the time of day or me sleeping so I had to put my headphones on so I could sleep for a bit longer before getting up.
In the day it was so quiet in the room I felt self conscious about my breathing or making any noise so it was stressful. I totally enjoyed meeting lovely people and absolutely would take away that going on a walking tour when solo travelling is a great way of meeting like minded people, but hostels are not for me.
Positive Reviews:
The staff were most definitely the best thing about this place. Walking tour was great and gave me a chance to make friends other travellers.
The room was very clean and facilities great. Much better than I would have imagined a hostel to be. Even in top bunk I felt like I had privacy, a little shelf with a door, plugs and light. Bring 2 locks for the cabinets as these aren’t provided, however you can buy them at reception if you forget.
Little rooftop terrace was amazing as I spent afternoons after sightseeing mornings there sunbathing and cooling off in the pool. Be aware there are no loungers so bring towel to lie on.
Breakfast was reasonable and great for €7. Dinner was only €12 for 3 courses and 2 drinks, so you can’t complain.

Negative Reviews: Very small things like the bed a bit too hard and bathroom got wet when taking shower.
Positive Reviews: Stayed in the private room. It was very comfortable and clean. Everything new and well maintained. The staff is great and the breakfast very good. For the private room breakfast was included, which was a nice surprise! It is a walking distance from La Sagrada Familia and some other points. We also could go walking to Gracia neighbourhood during the evening for some restaurants.

Negative Reviews: The shower didn’t have a vent so it was quite humid after someone took a shower. I also think it could be cleaned slightly better.
Positive Reviews: This was my first hostel experience and it was everything I could have asked for. The staff were fantastic - particularly Pablo. The hostel provided (paid) dinner and breakfast, which was fairly decent value for money. I stayed in a female only dorm and appreciated the ample and secure storage locker for luggage. I also loved that the bunk beds had curtains - though this isn’t the case for upper bunks.

Negative Reviews: The 6-bed female dormitory has only one bathroom. In the morning if one person is having a shower the toilet can't be used and vice versa.
Positive Reviews: The hostel was very well located, near the gothic quarter and within walking distance of Sagrada Familia. The staff were very friendly and polite. You can choose to have breakfast there - it was AMAZING! The beds were super comfy!

Negative Reviews: Air Conditioner was a bit to cold in the Setup (16 C-18 C) . I had to ask twice to make the room warmer
Positive Reviews: Very clean, good breakfast, nice service.

Review Title: Clean hostel, nice staff, awesome people!
Negative Reviews: Curtains on the upstairs beds would be a plus.
Positive Reviews:
The staff was amazing, Leo helped me changing the room to get a downstairs bed. The hostel was clean, offered walking tours, breakfast, dinner and pub crawls.

Super easy to meet new and chill people from around the world!

Review Title: A very nice experience to repeat.
Negative Reviews: Maybe i would have preferred a different  organization of the bathroom in one single room.
Positive Reviews:
I really liked the organization of the hotel, it's very simple to meet new people thanks to the  common areas. The staff is very kind and helpful.
The breakfast,for only 5 euros,  is abundant and varied. 
The dinner is great, the quality of the food is really good. 
The beds are comfortables. 
I reccomend the Hostel to everyone.

Negative Reviews:
- There aren't enough toilets. There are five floors of rooms and only one shared toilet for men and one for women. Other than that each room has a shared toilet. There were several instances I had to wait.
- I didn't like that the showers are in the rooms and that the door beeps when you enter. It's kind of problematic if you want to shower, leave or enter when people are sleeping.
Positive Reviews:
- The buffet breakfast is well worth it for only 5 euros. Big selection of good food and you can eat as much as you like.
- Very friendly and helpful staff.
- Comfortable beds.
- I didn't get to try the pool but that's worth mentioning.

Review Title: Very comfortable bed, friendly staff and central location!
Negative Reviews: The walls are pretty thin, so when someone shut the door in an other room I woke up every time. The toilette is way too small, so I had to do tetris to get into it. The general cleanliness could be a bit better in my opinion but it was fine for a hostel.
Positive Reviews: The bed was really comfortable and I liked the curtain. The staff was always kind and really helpful. The community dinners and the walking tours were a nice plus. The hostel was in a safe district, and there were many shops nearby. The rooftop was really cool, I bet it’s even better during summer. 😍It’s good they opened the window for a couple of hours in each room every day so there was fresh air always. The bag storage was very big and there was even a small nightstand where you could charge your phone.

Review Title: A nice little home in Barcelona
Negative Reviews: The lift was broken the first day and our room was on the top floor! But otherwise it was nice.
Positive Reviews:
Very helpful staff, shout out to Irina, very sweet girl at the front desk.
Breakfast was good. Beds were so comfy and lockers were huge.

Negative Reviews: the upper bed (bunk bed) has no curtains so you cannot avoid the light if someone turns it on
Positive Reviews: staff is amazing and super kind, breakfast is very very good, rooms are also comfortable

Negative Reviews: In a mixed room on the 6th floor there was only hot water pouring from the tap and I did not manage to change it though I turned the tap head right and left.
Positive Reviews: A friendly hostel 300 m from metro Verdaguer and a short walk from av. Diagonal. You can bake your pancakes yourself in the morning (dough is ready). Fridge in the kitchen can be used to store food and a kettle – to make tea. There's a pool on the rooftop to sink your feet and relax. Beds are very comfortable, with a personal light and socket.

Negative Reviews: Bathroom felt a bit too cramped, even for a small guy like me.
Positive Reviews: Staffs were very nice! Had good course dinner prepared by the hostel. The stay was comfortable and they had huge lockers to stuff my entire suitcase inside.

Negative Reviews:
Room is too small.
Too dark inside the room. They should have more lights inside it. Also the bedside reading lights are too dim. 
A bit stuffy inside the room.
Positive Reviews: Clean, big dining area, big fridge, good value dinners, polite staff.

Negative Reviews: Everything was great! :)
Positive Reviews: Rooms were very clean and felt quite spacious despite being a shared room (I stayed in one for four people). The staff and the rest of hosts were very nice, and made the stay feel great. The hostel is very close to a train station, to Sagrada Familia and there are plenty of places to eat and hang out around. Hostel also offers walking tours, breakfast (for 5€) and dinner (for 12€).

Review Title: The best hostel in beautiful Barcelona
Negative Reviews: nothing!
Positive Reviews:
I liked everything about Yeah Barcelona! this was my third stay there. I didn’t want to be home alone at Christmas so knew exactly where to go.  I had a few of the dinners, all which were delicious and well worth the €12, I got to meet and talk to lots of different people. 

the hostel is clean, the rooms are perfect, the beds are spacious and comfortable. The kitchen is good and there is a fridge to store your cold items. I used the laundry while I was there, again all good. There’s a lovely lounge with plenty of seating and likewise for the dining room too. 

I went on the walking tour of the gothic quarter which was ran by Pablo, he was very informative and I learned a lot.

The staff are all very friendly and accommodating, nothing is too much trouble! 

everyone that I spoke to while I was there said how amazing the hostel was and how it was the best one they’d ever stayed in… same goes for me, so much so that I will be back

Amazing place & staff ! The pool is excelent & also the food, and the facilities are way more excelent thand shown . Defenetley will come again, and again to stay here . I deeply reccoment . The room with 4 girls, was excelent, and also made new kind friendships . Thank you !

Negative Reviews: Nothing really to mention here
Positive Reviews:
Great stuff, very attentive and super helpful,
Great food for €12 with 3 drinks included in price, very clean, great for socialising, they do walking tours during the day and pub night outs in the evening. I recommend to everyone to stay in Yeah hostel. Best experience and best hostel in barcelona
Nice kitchen with the best breakfast and dinner, high-quality facilities, high clean standard rooms, and the best receptionist David (hi from Kazakhstan 🇰🇿😉)

Very comfortable and clean with a great breakfast. Friendly staff and a friendly atmosphere in which everyone seems to have known each other for years. When I go to Barcelona again, I will definitely stay there.

Review Title: Thank you for the staff for your hard and rewarding work, and making me feel at home! :)
Negative Reviews: There is not any!
Positive Reviews:
My staying was phenomenal! 
Very clean and well-located hostel. Luxury facilities, sunny rooftop with a pool, also a quiet lounge if you want to study/work. I like that they offer breakfast and dinner with more meals and drinks for a reasonable price, appreciate the fact that also vegetarian meal. Paella I had was amazing, but I’d recommend to sign up for ALL in-side dinners!!
The staff is excellent! I was travelling solo but they made me feeling very comfortable. They are SUPER friendly, helpful, kind, nice, they help each guests the best way in whatever random question/request they have. Also they speak English and Spanish fluently, you can’t have any language obstacle with them.
Definitely recommended hostel, I wish I stayed longer! :)

Had such a fun stay at Yeah Hostel! It was so easy to talk to anyone there (guests and staff) and make friends, had such a great time and I would definitely come back! Curtains on the bunk beds were a great help for having a good sleep, and I really liked how big the lockers were as well. I enjoyed the €12 3 course + sangria dinner which led into the pub crawl - the pub crawl goes to different bars and clubs each night as well so you can definitely go more than once! Arguably one of the best hostels I've stayed in :)

Amazing staff. Group dinner was great. The dorm can be a little bit noisy with people coming in and out in the early morning. Convenience of baggage storage. Good facilities. Sunset at the rooftop was great.

Review Title: A great and comfortable place to stay
Positive Reviews: It is an extremely comfortable hostel with spacious rooms, new and modern installations, and enough space to socialize. Check-in and out was easy, staff was friendly. I joined one dinner at the hostel and the food was good with fair price. They also have a pool so during summer it must be great to hang out there.

Without a doubt one of the best hostels I've ever stayed at. Everything is very clean, comfortable and modern. The staff is amazing as well, very helpful and friendly. The free walking tours by Mario and Pablo are great as well and a good way to kick start your own exploring of the city. If you are traveling alone and interested in meeting people, this is the perfect hostel for you. The walking tours, dinners and breakfast are perfect for that, but even just sitting in the lounge you can meet others. I will definitely be coming back here.

Fresh, clean, comfortable room, a lot of space and really big bed, even though we had just a 4 bed female dormitory.
 Available huge kitchen where we could cook food. Really helpful stuff. If you forgot anything like a tower or soap - it is just to ask and you can borrow it for free( in my case I forgot towel at home).
After a long day on foot in Barcelona it was really nice to come to the hostel and pleasant to sleep getting rest for the next day.

One of the best hostels I have ever stayed in my life (and I’ve stayed in many). So comfortable!! Rooms and en-suite toilets are spotless! Lots of space to work (quietly), activities and dinners every night. But I would say the service is the differentiator: the staff and the girls on the reception are so friendly and welcoming, always trying to help you. Special thanks to Soraia :)

Negative Reviews: If you need a lot of privacy and calm, maybe avoid this place, because it is quite sociable and active. That being said, there are some corners of the hostel where one can find a lot of calm :)
Positive Reviews:
It's just a very good hostel. I spent a few days here, and I was not in the mood to do too much socialising, but I could see that everyone else would gather in groups and explore the city together, which was very nice. However I did enjoy a good conversation in the breakfast hall every day!
The staff is amazing, super friendly and kind. 
The rooms are very comfortable and clean; also tastefully designed. There are lockers for the baggage and small ones next to beds.
The lounge is great for working. I spent a few hours there with my laptop everyday and found it very good and did not have any major distractions.
Objectively, this is a fantastic hostel!

Review Title: Very nice to stay at, lovely staff, recommend
Negative Reviews: The only thing that was an issue, was the number and place of plugs in the common area. But it's not really a problem overall.
Positive Reviews:
In the room : the bed with private curtain and big drawer along with a small personal locker 
Common area : good wifi, plenty of room for remote working
Staff : super helpful, group tours & dinners offered great for solo travellers
Overall : very clean, well planned and thought out details

It was perfect!  The staff is very friendly and helpful, the rooms are very comfortable, clean, the place to leave luggage is large and there are many hooks for hanging jackets.  The food is great, I even got for free to try the paella with seafood and traditional Spanish dessert.  Great experience, I highly recommend!

Review Title: Best place to stay in Barcelona
Negative Reviews: Nothing in particular
Positive Reviews: Once again the exceptional clean of the place, the facilities, the staff the complete breakfast for 5 €, the evening lunch with the paella as a summit and the staff who is particularly efficient and kind. They are always try to help you.

We really enjoyed our stay in Yeah Barcelona Hostel. Stayed in 6-bed dorm for women only, the beds were amazingly comfortable and curtains made them very private. The staff was wonderful, helpful and kind. Breakfast was great and really worth of money. Common dinners, walking tours and pub crawls were very nice and a good way to get to know the city and other hostel guests.

Review Title: Great hostel that is perfectly set up for soho travellers.
Positive Reviews: Fantastic social hostel perfect for solo travellers. Had social dinners every night where you could meet others and then go on a night out after if you wanted to. Rooftop with a pool is a nice addition and the relaxed downstairs room is also very nice. Lovely staff that were happy to help with anything, nice facilities sharing a toilet and shower only with your own room is nice and good touchers like a sliding draw for next to your head as well as a lockable draw under your bed. Would highly recommend the walking tour with Pablo.

Review Title: Also there is an portrait of Lenny Kravitz near door of my room, I like it
Positive Reviews:
Yeah hostel impressed me a lot. I didn’t expect such great accommodation conditions and facilities from hostel. Prices for breakfast, dinner and drinks are pretty cheap compared to average check in Barcelona. Moreover, dinner here it is the other great experience, cause it is not only about tasty food. If you going stay here, check it at least once. 
But the greatest thing are the people who worked there during my stay. Many greetings to Wi-sin, Anna, and Iryna for hospitality, guides and that positive vibes.

Review Title: Clean, modern, extremely fun, great staff, easy to meet people
Positive Reviews: Clean, modern faciilities, extremely friendly staff, tons of events and activities, incredible food options. This is the place to be in Barcelona!

Review Title: Also there is an portrait of Lenny Kravitz near door of my room, I like it
Positive Reviews:
Yeah hostel impressed me a lot. I didn’t expect such great accommodation conditions and facilities from hostel. Prices for breakfast, dinner and drinks are pretty cheap compared to average check in Barcelona. Moreover, dinner here it is the other great experience, cause it is not only about tasty food. If you going stay here, check it at least once. 
But the greatest thing are the people who worked there during my stay. Many greetings to Wi-sin, Anna, and Iryna for hospitality, guides and that positive vibes.

The staff are amazing and really helpful 
The lounge is so comfy  so in case you checked out and you have a late flight you can stay there, there is even a bed in the lounge!
The beds are comfy and with curtains which gives privacy!
The dinner and the pup crawl and the free morning walking tours highly recommended....

This was one of the best hostels I have ever been to. Rooms are spacious and each has own bathroom and shower, which is really nice. Bathroom was so clean everyday. Common rooms are beautifull and cozy, just like you're at home. Staff are friendly and informative. Breakfast was so delicious.

Review Title: Fun hostel in Barcelona, super clean and a great stay.
Positive Reviews:
Loved this hostel, the rooms were spacious, aircon, and private bathrooms included (safe lockers too). 

Common area was great, food was great too, and the activities really well planned out. You could tell the staff love their job and make it an overall amazing experience. 

My top rated hostel.

Review Title: I loved it! Staying in a hostel was a new thing for me and it couldn’t have been better. thank you, guys!
Positive Reviews: Great place, lovely staff, spacious living area, city tours and pub crawls available. the food options were great. bed was very comfortable and sheets were nice and clean.

Review Title: Fantastic hostel offers lots of experiences
Negative Reviews: nothing really.
Positive Reviews: Yeah Hostel offers clean room, modern and bright interior design and fun environment. The staffs are super friendly and very helpful for traveling tips. The bar provides breakfast and dinner, and offers a great communal space for people to know each other, and get ready for night tour (pub crawl). You can use their commercial kitchen to prepare food. There is a roof top bar with a small swimming pool, great place to have a drink, chill out at the pool and watch sunset. Mario and Diego are fantastic tour guide - they offer two different city tours focus on old town (history ) and culture and architecture.

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Great hostel, well located. Rooms are spacious and clean. Beds are comfortable and the curtains give a lot of privacy. Staff super friendly, you can tell they make a big effort to give everyone a great experience. Optional dinner and breakfast were great value. The pool is very useful in the Barcelona summer.

Review Title: Best hostel in Barcelona! No question.
Positive Reviews: It was the 3rd time that I’ve stayed at this hostel. The staff is incredibly available. The shared spaces, the room, the dinner… everything was well design to offer v the best guest experience possible. Thank you very much.

I loved the energy and joy that staff put into this very comfortable , clean and well located place. Wonderful people! I enjoyed my stay very much and made lots of friends. I highly recommend it to everyone who wants to have a memorable trip to Barcelona. 
Oh, I almost forgot! Food was AMAZINGLY delicious! Well done Yeah Barcelona. I will definitely come back :)

Negative Reviews: There was nothing I didn't like about this stay.
Positive Reviews: Gracia is my favourite area to stay in Barcelona. And I wouldn't stay in any other hostel other than here in BCN. We had a double room which was comfortable and spacious. Breakfast was included which had something for everyone so if you need to pay the €7 to get it then it's well worth it. Staff are helpful and friendly.

Thank you for a great time spent in Barcelona. City walks with Mario and Leo showed all important places. Both guides showed their passion for the City and shared a lot of historical knowledge and usefull tips. Tours are a great introduction to later explore in more detail places of your interest (most are fee entry). Dorms are spacious, beds are comfortable and  not positioned face to face. Delicious breakfast and eveninig lunch for the money paid. For those who like to party every day there was a pub crowl and every time different pubs were visited. Seo was a great host of those late night trip.

The super friendly staff, very comfortable common spaces, very comfortable and clean beds.
Delicious breakfast and dinner service!!

Review Title: 10/10 Amazing Hostel that has amazing social life and clean environment
Positive Reviews: Amazing place to stay, good social life, amazing staff, the dinner and pub crawl is amazing. Amazing buffet breakfast for €7 which is amazing for how much you can eat. Overall 10/10 stay and would definitely stay again. As a couple we stayed in a 4 bed dorm and it was super nice cause it was private and clean and spacious

Negative Reviews: Nada
Positive Reviews: Everything! Dinner was cheap and excellent. It was great to meet people. The staff were very kind and helpful. Facilities were clean, modern and comfortable. I recommend to everyone!

Negative Reviews: The wooden bunk beds were very noisy once the person at the top was moving. The dining room benches were quite uncomfortable as they were way too high compared to the tables. The paid breakfast was OK and plentiful but the coffee was terrible. I mean how much extra does it cost to provide a bit better coffee and a bit better orange juice?
Positive Reviews: The AC was amazing, the personnel very helpful, the breakfast excellent value for 5€, huge storage box for stuff and luggage in the rooms and daily cleaning. The location was very very good, just at the sweet spot between Born, La Sagrada and Gracia.

Review Title: Highly recommended, one of the best hostels in Europe.
Negative Reviews: The shower could be better.
Positive Reviews: The place itself is really cool, with bar, places to rest and room with camera to place the luggage before check-in, staff were great also, on the rooms there's huge draws to keep things, bed with chargers and curtains to close.

Review Title: Great hostel with great social vibes
Negative Reviews: The room was a bit hot especially at night time, and I was in the top bunk.
Positive Reviews: Great hostel with friendly staff, and a warm social vibe - people stay here to meet others. Walking tours and pub crawl available. Rooms and beds were clean. There's enough space to sit up in your bunk and there are curtains for the lower bunks. The rooms were quiet (just depends on how noisy your roomies are) but you can't hear noise from downstairs.

Negative Reviews: The shower is a bit small
Positive Reviews: The staff were amazing, super friendly and helpful. The room is spacious and everyone has their own privacy with the curtain. The best hostel I’ve stayed in Europe so far!

Negative Reviews: The chargers in my bed didn't work so wasn't able to charge my phone in my room
Positive Reviews: Everything. Other guests were all friendly, staff were very nice and helpful, facilities were very clean

Negative Reviews: The bathroom in my room was not ventilated enough, and as a consequence, it was constantly wet and a bit dirty.
Positive Reviews: The room, the facilities and the hostel in general is very well-decorated, there is fresh water at disposal, and the staff was very nice!

Negative Reviews: the room was too dark. mattresses very high, all of us hit our heads. 2 power cuts in two nights lol.
Positive Reviews: very friendly staff, clean facilities.

Negative Reviews: There is no shampoo in the bathroom but it seems like they rarely clean the bathroom as I found plenty of empty used shampoo bottle. The beds are cofortable but the upper bed of the bunker is a little hard to climb on as there is nothing for you to hold on to.
Positive Reviews:
I found the hostel accidentally but it turned out to be the best experience in Barcelona. The hostel is 5 minutes walk from the nearest metro/bus station. You can easily reach the famous Sagrada Familia and the Gracia district just some blocks away. I chose the 6-bed mixed room which was more convient than I expected as the room was not full for the 3 days I stayed there. They had a spacious a very secure luggage storage for everyone, plus the luggage room to store your stuff after check out. The meals offered and the walking tour were also great. But above all of that you will find the most friendly and helpful young staff there who are always ready ready to listen and help you with everything, even in planning your trip and guide you to the proper places in the city. They really made the stay much more memorable.
PS: It is not usual to find a hostel with iMac for guests at your disposal.

Negative Reviews: the room was too dark. mattresses very high, all of us hit our heads. 2 power cuts in two nights lol.
Positive Reviews: very friendly staff, clean facilities.

Negative Reviews: open washstand, toilet and shower quite noisy at night
Positive Reviews: Nice atmosphere around hostel, clean facility and welcoming staff

Negative Reviews: In the morning and at night the bedrooms can bit v warm, it is law that windows cant be open after a certain time so itd not their fault.
Positive Reviews: The atmosphere and overall feel was laid back, friendly and comfortable. Great facilities- large kitchen, large hang out area and a pool and bar at the top of the building. Very clean and staff all really helpful anf welcoming. Good amount of storage in bedroom. Highly recommend!

Negative Reviews:
Room window cannot be opened during the night which can lead to the lack of fresh air in the room.
Cleaning lady opens window for a few hours during the day.
Positive Reviews:
Hostel staff was really helpfull.
It has a kitchen that you can use, there also a lounge area where you can relax with tv, large bed, lazy bags, etc.
Room was clean, beds were comfy, there is an ac in the room.

Negative Reviews: Just the location was a bit far away from the areas I wanted to go ( the beach and el gothic) so I took the train but I prefer to walk as the metro was too hot for me!
Positive Reviews: The staff were amazing and so friendly. The terrace was so cool as well with amazing views. My mattress was so comfy too so I slept very well. The whole hostel looks amazing to be honest. The air conditioning was good too as I’ve been in hostels where it was loud when on. The dinner with the hostel was great to make friends and the pub crawl. The staff definitely made the trip because they seemed to really enjoy what they were doing and made every single person feel welcome. It was also really clean. I would only stay here if ever I came back to Barcelona! Graciasss

Review Title: Conventient, clean, modern and friendly, but best if you like to party, go out, etc.
Negative Reviews: The hostel is a bit further from Barcelonas best places, like restaurants, etc. but this can also be seen as a plus. Keep in mind that shared bedrooms can be noisy and busy. The aircondition was very cold and made the air dry everywhere, but it can be switched off in the rooms. If you are not there to party, you might not like the vibe, music, etc., but overall it is very comfortable and relaxed.
Positive Reviews: Very clean and friendly hostel with party vibes all day. Nice public spaces to relax or work. Rooms were clean, modern and functional. Using the elevator was very convenient when traveling with luggage. The location is not directly in the tourist area.

Negative Reviews:
Unfortunately, we saw and had to kill at least two cockroaches in the bathroom. Meaning there might be more that we haven't seen. 

The breakfast was just 5 euros per person, so the food quality was rather average: diluted or powder-made juices and coffee, stale pastry, etc.
Positive Reviews: It's a good hostel, nicely decorated and reasonably priced. The area around felt safe and it's not loud during the night. We stayed in a room with 4 beds and it was nice having a private bathroom. The staff was helpful. If you need to park your car - the underground parking is 10 euros per day, which seems very reasonable for such a central location.

Negative Reviews: I think breakfast is a bit expensive for its worth & would be great if they added a shower carpet because it gets very messy.
Positive Reviews: Is my second time staying here. The atmosphere, with the staff & the other travellers is incredible. You have a kitchen at your disposal, the activities that they offer + common areas make it super easy to know new people, the room is cleaned every single day & you have public transport & all facilities super close.

Negative Reviews: The upper deck of double deck bed is to low. The location is a bit far away from city center if you usually walk.
Positive Reviews: The Bathroom in side the room is quite convenient and bar service is good.

Review Title: An incredible hostel - you won’t regret booking it
Negative Reviews: nothing

The rooms were really nice, they had a sink in the and a shower and toilet, both separately but still in the room so you could use everything at the same time. It was very clean and everyone had a huge box for their luggage under the bed and a small place beside the bed and you could lock both with your own locker or rent one. someone from the house keeping came and closed the window for the night but i didn’t consider it negative in a room with 4 people it was totally fine.

I stayed in a 6 beds shared room. 
The beds aren't one in front of others, so you have a little more privacy. 
The drawer to store things is very big, so I was able to store my baggage and still take all the clothes and sneakers out of it and organize them. Perfect.
Good shower, good toilet.
Very very good breakfast for a good price (7 euros).

I was satisfied with my stay and recommend staying at the Yeah Hostel!!

Positive Reviews:
It was very nice and clean. I was a bit worried about noise because there was a lot of groups traveling, etc., but it wasn’t a problem at all. I was by myself and was very comfortable to stay there. 
Breakfast is very handful and a good price for a buffet. 
Staff it’s super nice!

Review Title: Surely the best hostel in Barcelona
Negative Reviews: We liked everything!! This isn't a reflection of the hostel at all, but I will note (in case it's important to some) that 95% of the travellers that were there when we stayed were 21-24 years old. But it's incredibly easy to make friends and overall a great experience.
Positive Reviews:
Incredible hostel! Very comfortable rooms and bed. The staff were amazing, super friendly and had great recommendations. We did the walking tour as well which one one of the highlights of our trip. The dinner was delish and the hostel was so well organised and run. Completely exceeded our expectations. 

The area felt super safe because we were away from Las Ramblas and we never felt uncomfortable walking around. It was refreshing to get into the area and not feel like we had to watch our bags. It was still close to everything though -- 15 min walk from most places you'd want to visit.

It is the best hostel that I have ever been, amazing rooms, organized and clean, has good beds, and very nice staff. Everything you need they offer you.

There is breakfast available for a good price and it was fantastically good, there is also dinner, for a good price, which is nice to meet people and enjoy a good time.

Really well located, easy to go for most part of the places.

Negative Reviews: These are details in a generally excellent hostel. The fact that the sink was in the same area as the beds. Actually some hostels do that due to lack of space in the room but it is not practical at all because you don't have privacy and you have to annoy others when you wash yourself especially at night. The elevator was EXTREMELY slow. Perhaps the slowest elevator I've seen in any place that I have stayed. And the WiFi had some serious issues and it disconnects many times. I used almost 1Gb of mobile data watching a movie because I didn't realize that the WiFi had disconnected.
Positive Reviews: The hostel was in a very good location near to almost everything. The rooms and the bathrooms were clean. The beds provided privacy though I would prefer if the upper beds had also curtains. The stuff was polite and very helpful. Also the bed mattresses where very nice.

Negative Reviews:
1. Elevator was a bit slow
2. I appreciate that hostel team is doing some Integration, but I think they could instruct participants how they should behave after they come back to room late night. It's not hostel fault, but reminder would be nice.
Positive Reviews:
1.The room was very clean, tidy and specious. 
2.Each bed got the light us plugs and one normal, electric, you can charge your phone and lock the charger ( you need your own pad locker)
3. Big bathroom in the room. No crowds, don't have to leave your room.
4. Stuff is friendly, especially woman who did my check out.we had some nice chat
5.It's quiet place (at least my room at 5th floor)
6. Magnetic lockers to the room, so  o one without it cannot enter, it's safe
7. Location, lidl, aldi, and metro plus plenty of buses in 4 minutes walk.

Negative Reviews: I found the bathrooms to be quite messy, previous guests had left things lying around and it made for a very messy space. Guess that’s dorm life!
Positive Reviews: Staff were very friendly and helpful! Good location, and comfortable beds.

Negative Reviews: Unfortunately the wifi is bad and kept dropping out in the room.
Positive Reviews: Great staff, good social activities, big drawers for luggage, free luggage storage prior to check in, lovely rooftop with views.

Negative Reviews: The shower could be a bit more spacious - maybe with a chair or shelf inside for clothes. And the upper beds could use a curtain for privacy.
Positive Reviews: Very central, social - comfy bed, helpful staff! ☺️

Negative Reviews: There is nothing I disliked. Something that would make this hostel stand out even more would be to have additional toilet facilities on each floor besides the bathroom/toilet in the rooms.
Positive Reviews: Great location, quiet rooms, comfortable beds, not a party hostel though there is opportunity to socialise in the common areas. Nice staff. Clean. Value for money.

Negative Reviews:
1. Elevator was a bit slow
2. I appreciate that hostel team is doing some Integration, but I think they could instruct participants how they should behave after they come back to room late night. It's not hostel fault, but reminder would be nice.
Positive Reviews:
1.The room was very clean, tidy and specious. 
2.Each bed got the light us plugs and one normal, electric, you can charge your phone and lock the charger ( you need your own pad locker)
3. Big bathroom in the room. No crowds, don't have to leave your room.
4. Stuff is friendly, especially woman who did my check out.we had some nice chat
5.It's quiet place (at least my room at 5th floor)
6. Magnetic lockers to the room, so  o one without it cannot enter, it's safe
7. Location, lidl, aldi, and metro plus plenty of buses in 4 minutes walk.

Review Title: Overall, I had a great time and would love to return to Barcelona Hostel during my next visit.
Negative Reviews:
Although I brought my own white towel to the hostel, the cleaning staff mistaken it for the hostel towel and took it from my room. I reported it to the staff at reception, but they didn't return my towel, saying that it was sent to the laundry room :( This made the continuation of my trip through Europe a bit uncomfortable, since in all the other cities I stayed, I always had to borrow/rent a towel, which I wasn't intending to do. 

Also, PLEASE be careful with the sockets at the hostel room! I believe a short circuit occurred when charging my phone, which is why it broke. I'm not sure if it was because of the hostel facility or the general electricity supply in Barcelona, so please just be aware that such situations can happen.
Positive Reviews: My stay at Barcelona Hostel exceeded all my expectations! The rooms were comfortable and clean; the staff was very friendly and always happy to help. It was my first time staying at a hostel, and frankly, I didn't expect to feel so safe and comfortable. 9pm dinners and open buffet breakfasts were a great value for the money and I met so many enthusiastic travelers!

Review Title: Overall, I had a great time and would love to return to Barcelona Hostel during my next visit.
Negative Reviews:
Although I brought my own white towel to the hostel, the cleaning staff mistaken it for the hostel towel and took it from my room. I reported it to the staff at reception, but they didn't return my towel, saying that it was sent to the laundry room :( This made the continuation of my trip through Europe a bit uncomfortable, since in all the other cities I stayed, I always had to borrow/rent a towel, which I wasn't intending to do. 

Also, PLEASE be careful with the sockets at the hostel room! I believe a short circuit occurred when charging my phone, which is why it broke. I'm not sure if it was because of the hostel facility or the general electricity supply in Barcelona, so please just be aware that such situations can happen.
Positive Reviews: My stay at Barcelona Hostel exceeded all my expectations! The rooms were comfortable and clean; the staff was very friendly and always happy to help. It was my first time staying at a hostel, and frankly, I didn't expect to feel so safe and comfortable. 9pm dinners and open buffet breakfasts were a great value for the money and I met so many enthusiastic travelers!

Review Title: Nice place; overpriced as a lot of them in Barcelona; safe feeling
Negative Reviews:
The structure of the kitchen. If you happen to cook while the cook prepares a meal for the dinner (yes you can buy it but for me this long social dinner wasn’t an option) then you have almost no space to cook your own dish.

Separate and VERY small showers in the rooms. Lack of the shelves in them, clothes end’s up falling on the wet floor.

Extra tiny sink in the toilet would be beneficial. Otherwise you have to wash your hands at night in a room next to someone’s bed.
Positive Reviews:
Great location, very comfortable beds with convenient storage space and the locker next to the bed.
Nice and friendly staff.
24 hour reception with anyone at the counter - you really get a feeling that no stranger can enter the hostel unnoticed (which is good if you know the crime rates in Barcelona).

Negative Reviews: The elevator can take a while to arrive😅
Positive Reviews: Where do i even start. Great location, awesome facilities, lovely staff and overall a great atmosphere. There are a lot of activities that allow you to enjoy the city and meet other people. Very comfortable rooms and great sense of safety.

Review Title: Great place, would stay here again!
Negative Reviews: The wifi wasn't great inside the bedroom, but otherwise all good!
Positive Reviews: Great hostel! Really well located, cool vibe, super friendly and helpful staff, beds were comfy, rooms were clean. Didn't try the breakfast so I won't comment on that. There's also an area that's perfect to do remote work if you need to.

Review Title: Best hostel I have visited in Barcelona
Negative Reviews: I didnt like that upper beds do not have curtains. And the space between the lower bed abd upper bed is super small.
Positive Reviews: I loved the shower and toilet in the room, the cleaning was done every day. The staff was superfriendly, the 1st floor chill out room was great to rest and chat. The breakfast options for 5 euro were just incredible.

Negative Reviews: The free wifi sometimes didn‘t work that well up in my room but that‘s basically the only „negative“ point.
Positive Reviews:
I‘m absolutely in love with this hostel! It‘s clean, it‘s comfortable, there are 3-4 metro lines nearby, the staff is always friendly and helpful.
You can sign up for dinner every night and have a 3 course meal for just 12€ (and the chef is amazing, the food is super delicious!). It‘s also a good chance to meet other people and have a nice chat.

Review Title: All in all it was really good and I’ll definitely be back.
Negative Reviews: the tea brand is bad. they need to invest a few more pennies to get the good stuff, even lipton. also, the towels were useless for drying. very cheap, no absorption and just moved the water around my body rather than drying me.
Positive Reviews: good facilities, great staff who were friendly and knowledgeable. the tour was fabulous, by pablo. the bed was comfy and my fellow dorm mates were respectful about noise. the breakfast was great, and the lounge very comfortable.

Negative Reviews: The elevator is a bit slow but there are stairs!
Positive Reviews:
The best hostel I have ever stayed at!! The staff went out of their way to make you feel welcome and included at the hostel. They host affordable hostel dinner’s + drinks every night which was a great way to meet other people when travelling solo. They also offer walking tours + pub crawls every day which were lots of fun! This was probably the comfiest hostel bed I’ve ever slept in. The beds have curtains and the lockers underneath each bed is so spacious. I honestly can’t fault this hostel. 

Shoutout to Pablo for making my stay super memorable! He hosted an awesome walking tour and always checked up on the guests throughout their stays to see how they were travelling.

Negative Reviews: The upper beds don’t have curtains for privacy.
Positive Reviews: The place has a good vibe, it’s clean and comfortable to stay and worth for your money. The staff are helpful and friendly.

Review Title: enjoyed my stay would come again and recommend to others.
Negative Reviews: it feels like the air isn’t flowing in the night in mixed dorm, also not sure why the shower is a bit smelly but it looks clean.
Positive Reviews: comfy bed, en-suite toilet and shower, friendly staff, thoughtful on storing luggage.

Review Title: Worst experience as first time in a hostel.
Negative Reviews:
I didn't enjoy the fact that I have been put with 3 men in the room that were very noisy and snoring very loud.

The room temp was way too hot and couldn't sleep at all as I was put on the upper bed whefe there was no curtains either to keep it dark and have more privacy.
Positive Reviews: I liked that most of the staff was friendly and the place was clean and safe.

Negative Reviews: Nothing that disturbed us.
Positive Reviews: Very friendly staff, incredibly clean and super located! Just Perfect for the backpackers! We have also participated the night crawl with Pablo who took care of everything and us at the same time.

Negative Reviews: Because of the AC the room was a little bit cold during the night. There was no socket next to the bed.
Positive Reviews: The staff was so nice, we left our bags after check out for free until our flight. The room was clean. Walking distance to sagrada familia.

Negative Reviews: Would have been practical to have a bit more allocated shelves, I e. In the shower or for toothbrushes as it'd get a bit messy. Also other hostels would often offer soap in the shower through a dispenser, would have been a nice plus.
Positive Reviews: Great vibe, clean and modern. Comfortable beds, friendly staff and some nice activities.

Negative Reviews: There is a bad smell in the room like from sewerage, drainage in sinks is clogged - water is not going away, heating is not really working - either heating to the max or not heating at all
Positive Reviews: Clean rooms, very nicely decorated, front desk is super helpful and nice, close to the old town

Review Title: Honestly my favorite hostel I’ve stayed at and would definitely go here again.
Negative Reviews: How small the bathroom was (to be expected in a hostel)
Positive Reviews: Super clean and friendly staff!

Review Title: Fantastic Hostel, location, staff and experience!
Negative Reviews: Bathrooms could have been cleaner.
Positive Reviews: Excellent staff - bed was super comfortable and private with the curtain.

Negative Reviews: The rooms need more lights and some lockers have a broken lock
Positive Reviews:
Staff friendliness especially Pablo 
Activities 
Cleanliness

Negative Reviews: Water gets wet really quick, there should be matts or twice a day cleaning or slippers provided
Positive Reviews: The staff was amazing. The service was good (like luggage storage, walking tour, AC etc).

Review Title: Private beds and modern, clean rooms
Negative Reviews: Gone are the days you could get a Hostel for $20 a night - and granted I stayed in a small room of 4 beds - but it was quite a lot of money and if you’re young and trying to travel cheap it’s a shame you can’t get somewhere nice like this at a lower price
Positive Reviews: Yeah Hostel was great - the staff were friendly and helpful, the rooms were private, modern and clean and the vibe was safe and relaxed

Negative Reviews: The shower did take a little while to warm up.
Positive Reviews:
The common room the staff were lovely.
Wesing and the catering crew were superb, good energy.

Negative Reviews: The light in the rooms could be brighter, if you need to shave its difficult to see the beard contours in the mirror.
Positive Reviews: Very friendly staff, nice rooms and amazing people. Can recommend this one for all who want to get in contact with people very fast.

Negative Reviews: Just wish that the upper beds had curtains too.
Positive Reviews: Super friendly staff, always trying to help when you need it. Comfy beds.

Negative Reviews: Room was a tad small for a 4 person shared room - although every bed had large draws to put your stuff in so it was manageable. Overall, I would definitely book again :)
Positive Reviews: Really clean, friendly and helpful staff, good vibe in the hostel, was great that we had our own private toilet and shower in the room.

Review Title: A perfect accommodation to explore the whole city
Negative Reviews: The shower was great, but shower curtains are not great and caused the bathroom floor to get wet. Personally I'm not a fan of the door key wristbands.
Positive Reviews: A perfect accommodation to explore the whole city! Value for money was really good, the shower was great, the rooftop was very nice to hang out and the staff were all super friendly and accommodating :)

Negative Reviews: It might have been better if there was a place to put your clothes in the shower to prevent them from getting wet.
Positive Reviews: I’ve tried several hostels in many different countries, and this was by far the best I’ve ever seen! The hostel was really clean compared to others, especially the bedsheets and bathroom. The staff was friendly and accommodating.

Negative Reviews: I found the bunk bed quite challenging to use after injuring my knee. Climbing up was a struggle, and unfortunately, I ended up falling down.
Positive Reviews: I was super impressed! It's clear they take cleanliness seriously, which made me feel really comfortable right from the start. The staff is super friendly! They genuinely seemed happy to help out with anything I needed.Thanks Philipe.

Negative Reviews: The only problem was people being loud getting ready and shaking the bed getting in and out in the mornings and evenings
Positive Reviews: it was very comfortable and a great opportunity to meet other travelers. It was clean as well, the staff were great and it was very quiet for a hostel.

Negative Reviews: Room lights are dim, one laundry machine always in use.
Positive Reviews: Lovely atmosphere and staff, clean room.

Negative Reviews: Washroom was not clean
Positive Reviews:
Staff 

Cleaning everything  and most important 24 hrs service

Negative Reviews: It could be nice if the top beds also had a curtain, but honestly I wore a sleep mask and it was great.
Positive Reviews:
The rooms were very complete, nicely designed, and clean. You even had a little bit of privacy. The staff was kind and professional. I was scared about cooking, but it turned out to be very easy and the staff in the kitchen helped me find everything I needed.
I didn’t do any of the hostel activities or visit the rooftop, but they seem to have a few options id that’s what you want to do in your trip.

Negative Reviews: Little detail/tip: the shower plate should be just some cm below the pavement, otherwise the water is gonna flood in the whole bathroom
Positive Reviews:
Super friendly, cheerful, cool staff and reception 24/7
Comfortable beds with curtains
It was also one of the cleanest hostel I've ever seen.
Really good position 
By far the coolest hostel I've ever been to

Review Title: The best hostel I visited so far
Negative Reviews: I didn't really have any negative experience. Maybe some little details, like the top beds could use curtains too.
Positive Reviews: The Hostel is clean and well equipped. The staff is kind and friendly. I especially like the hostel is full of life, easy to make friends as a solo traveller. The programs organized by the hostel are great too.

Negative Reviews: The stairs in the bunker beds are very uncomfortable and not so safe to go up. I hurt my feet twice trying to go up and down. Definitely needs to add extra handle and some soft pads in the steps.
Positive Reviews: Everything is very new and clean, staff are very friendly.

Review Title: best hostel, you will know friends and really clean
Negative Reviews: the beds are really comfortable
Positive Reviews: the hostel is real clean and the staff is amazing

Negative Reviews: The ac in the rooms was very cold (they turned it a bit up on request). Not much privacy in the top bunkbed,would be nice with a curtain like the lower bunkbeds.
Positive Reviews: Very nice and homelike decor. The beds were comfortable,rooms were a good size and lots of storage under the beds. Staff was nice and welcoming.

Review Title: The best hostel I visited so far
Negative Reviews: I didn't really have any negative experience. Maybe some little details, like the top beds could use curtains too.

Clean, Modern, Good facilities and amazing staff

Review Title: Can’t have a better place for a solo trip.
Negative Reviews: Just an opinion, it would be nice to have an extra washer and dryer.
Positive Reviews: Everything! The staff is so great, they really make  you feel like close friends. The cleanliness is good excellent, a whole crew cleans daily ten rooms. The beds are really comfortable and so as the lounge area. The vibe is great in here!

Everything was perfect, amazing friendly staff, organised pub crawls. Had so much fun and met loads of fantastic people. Bedroom was so clean, has curtains and a good bathroom. Cool terrace and lounge area

Review Title: Clean, modern, comfortable - just all around good.
Positive Reviews: Really cool vibe, a great lounge, good kitchen facilities and overall helpful staff. Beds were comfortable, with good storage as well, and a secondary locker with a plug on the inside (great, great idea). Everything kept very clean.

Negative Reviews: My friends and I only had one complaint, and that was that the night tour (bar crawl and clubbing) was quite far from the hostel, and it would've been nice if they offered a bar crawl slightly closer to the hostel rather than having to walk 40+ minutes just to get to the first bar.
Positive Reviews: The room was great, lots of secure storage space, loved that the beds had little curtains for privacy. The staff were incredible, super friendly and helpful!
Nice place to stay in the centre of Barcelona, close to Sagrada familia.  Nice and clean room. Very friendly and helpful staff. Everything perfect!

Negative Reviews: nothing! it was perfect for a solo trip
Positive Reviews:
The staff were great at making you feel welcome with the fanily meal on a night as well as daily walking tours and bar crawls you are sure to make friends so it is perfect for a solo traveller!
The rooms were so nice and cleaned everyday, and privacy was kept due to the curtains over each bed :)

Negative Reviews: Rooftop bar is opened until 9 pm which is nonsense, other travellers I talked to also agreed. At least leave the bar’s door unlocked so people who wish to hang out longer can do so! :)
Positive Reviews: Really nice and affordable hostel - a great place to meet travellers from all over the world! Rooms are quite spacious and comfy. Staff is really nice, specially “I sing, you sing, we sing” guy from the bar who lead pub crawls - really funny dude! :D

Negative Reviews: Everything was great.
Positive Reviews:
This hostel really exceeded my expectations! Great layout, clean and functional facilities (washing machine, bathrooms, kitchen etc) and comfortable beds with privacy curtains. They really strive to make a small community within the hostel and the results are fantastic - I met plenty of wonderful people here and was never short of activities to do.

The staff were all incredibly nice and eager to help with recommendations and any other way possible. Special mention to Pablo who was both charming and genuine, always making sure everything was running smoothly.

There was a great vibe in the hostel. Lots of space to chill in the lounge area and up on the roof. The staff were really friendly too. The hostel was super clean and comfortable, loads of plug sockets in the room and towels provided to use. There is also a great drawer built into each bed to allow people to store their stuff.

Negative Reviews: no complaints
Positive Reviews: affordable prices and clean facility, staffs are friendly and provide excellent services

Review Title: Outstanding hostel, hard to criticise anything about it
Positive Reviews: I’ve stayed in a LOT of hostels in my travels, and this one is definitely up there with the best. Friendly staff, secure entry, HUGE storage space in the rooms, great privacy, lovely rooftop, spacious common area, there’s not much else you can ask from a hostel.

Negative Reviews: nothing
Positive Reviews: the facilities were very clean and comfy. the staff and tourists very friendly.
Second visit, just a good as the first. Comfy bed, great staff, bright, fresh and smart building. I like the fact there are shower facilities in each dorm room.

Negative Reviews: Nothing to say here, I think the standard is very high for the hostel in such a good price.
Positive Reviews: The room was spotless clean, the bedsheets new and fresh and the bed was very comfortable. I also liked that there is a big common space with comfortable places to sit or work. All the staff were very friendly and helpful. :)
The staffs are passionate and nice. They will arrange some night tours which is quite fun. The room is clean and has lots of spaces to put stuffs.

Review Title: One of the best and modern hostels in the city for a great price.
Positive Reviews: Close to the metro, 15 mins from la Sagrada Familia. I love that the beds have curtains, personal reading light, power outlet and two usb ports for charging. The beds were very comfortable, compared to most other hostels. The interior is very modern and there is an elevator. The staff were very nice and friendly and spoke good English.

Review Title: The best hostel I’ve ever been too.
Positive Reviews: The staff are very helpful and friendly. I like the lounge it’s very cozy. The room are clean and the bed is comfy.

Negative Reviews: Top bunks had no privacy curtain and it wasn’t the easiest thing to get up the ladder. I also believe that the ladder should be at the bottom end of the below bunk rather than the top end so that your feet aren’t right next to the person below’s head.
Positive Reviews: Super friendly and a really nice place to stay. Good facilities, clean.

Negative Reviews: There was nothing not to like.
Positive Reviews: The rooms were clean and spacious enough, the bed was comfortable with enough privacy with the little curtain. I've met some amazing people there, both staff and guests, and had the best time possible.

Review Title: I had a very memorable stay, and had connected with the place, people and Barcelona through this hostel.
Negative Reviews: the upper bunker is almost imposible to climb up, as there not enough holding support. Be aware that there is no curtains on upper bunker.
Positive Reviews: I like everything about the hostel! the room are nice size, bathroom in the room shared with 6 others. clean and organized. great with the curtain in the lower bunks, it provides privacy if needed and shades from lights. I love that they arrange many different tours. I connected with many people during these tours, also because the tour guides creates a feeling for closeness and family. The bar/coffee place is nice to hang out. I will definitely stay here again if I revisit Barcelona.

Review Title: It was nothing short of amazing
Negative Reviews: Maybe have a water dispenser
Positive Reviews: room was really spacious and clean, bonus points for really comfortable bed! The staff there were really friendly and helpful as well. I’ll definitely be back if I’m back in Barcelona.

Negative Reviews: There was nothing not to like.
Positive Reviews: The rooms were clean and spacious enough, the bed was comfortable with enough privacy with the little curtain. I've met some amazing people there, both staff and guests, and had the best time possible.
Staff are super friendly and I like the public space with sofa and bed on the second floor

Negative Reviews: wish they were still doing night tours and social events but understandable due to covid. walking tours during the day is still on going (recommend) and the residents had no issue doing our own parties
Positive Reviews: the rooms were very spacious (including the lockers) and each dorm has its own bathroom so I only shared it with 5 girls rather than the entire hostel. staff was very helpful, was willing to chat and recommend things. there was an elevator, a rooftop with a pool, and two social areas. only ~15 minutes from la sagrada. met a lot of cool people, would stay again.
The hostel was so clean, comfortable.very near to Barcelona city centre. Staff were very friendly and rooms very awesome. I would for sure recommend this place to stay.

Review Title: I will stay here again for sure when I come back to Barcelona
Negative Reviews: There is only 1 washing machine so there is a long queue when you want to wash your clothes.
Positive Reviews: everything is in very good conditions. The bathroom is comfortable. The living room, rooftop and dining room are pretty nice. Staff speak english and spanish very well.

Review Title: If all hostels were like this one - I’d never stay in a hotel again.
Positive Reviews: Super cozy place with friendly staff, an excellent opportunity to meet new people and travellers from all around the world. The place is clean and facilities are great. :)

Negative Reviews: All good
Positive Reviews: The place was very well kept, the common areas and rooms were extremely clean and maintained well. The staff was so welcoming and helpful. I didn’t want to leave☹️. I met some amazing people in the hostel travelling from around the world. The metro was very close to the hostel, and the bus stop too. So it was very easy to get around. The surrounding area was quiet and safe with a lot of bars and shops. There were many walking tours and pub crawls arranged by the hostel. Can’t wait to go back ⭐️

Beds are comfortable and the rooftop bar and pool is ideal to hang out with people in the afternoon/evening.
Everyone is so friendly and happy to help and the daily guided tours are definitely worthwhile ! Pablo's walking tour of Barcelona's modernism was great 😁 thank you ! 
Would definitely recommend Yeah hostel !

Negative Reviews:
Bartender at the rooftop; 
The windows closed at night.
