Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Staff, room facilities all were super nice

Negative Reviews: Nothing to say here, I think the standard is very high for the hostel in such a good price.
Positive Reviews: The room was spotless clean, the bedsheets new and fresh and the bed was very comfortable. I also liked that there is a big common space with comfortable places to sit or work. All the staff were very friendly and helpful. :)

Review Title: A vibrant and fun hostel with amazing staff!
Negative Reviews: Roof terrace could be open a bit longer! But I don't have any other negative points during my stay.
Positive Reviews: Facilities were really nice! Love the communal room! Most of all, the staff! They were charismatic, very helpful and friendly, and always gave 100%.

Review Title: Amazing place to stay, couldn’t rate the place higher! Secure and comfortable!
Positive Reviews:
Cleanliness
Staff
Facilities

It was hands down the best hostel I've ever been in. They create an environment like family. Amazing meals. Awesome Rooftop. Clean confortable beds with lots of space for storing your clothes. :)

The staff was super super awesome too. Definitely going back.

Negative Reviews: Needs a pool table
Positive Reviews: Clean, fun staff, good facilities
Cool stay. Good rooms with bed compartment with integrated curtains. Toilet and shower in room. Extremely friendly, happy and customer-orientied staff. Good amenities, also bar, living room, rooftop.

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews:
Bed was comfy and private with the curtain. The locker was huge! Everything essential for solo-traveller was provided.

Staffs were helpful.

Storage room was spacious to keep the luggage.

My stay in Yeah hostel is amazing. I have requested them to give me a bed bank at the bottom and im happy they granted it. Also the facilities is amazing same as the staff which is very helpful and smiling.

Yeah Barcelona was hands down one of the best, if not the actual best hostel I’ve ever stayed at! It is excellent for meeting new people and making friends, with spacious and relaxing hangout areas like the rooftop (which has a nice pool and chill bar), and the tv room which has many comfortable chill spots and board games and books. There are always fun activities organised by the hostel you can choose to partake in, and the whole experience was super welcoming. While it is social, there is also plenty of space to have some alone time and relax on your own, and no pressure to join any activities if you don’t want to. The walking tours were very impressive as well - I went on the modernism tour with Leo who was super passionate and knowledgeable, especially about Gaudi and who was a super fun guide. I also did the Gothic Tour with Pablo, and he was just as good, with lots of helpful recommendations and insights into the city and it’s history. I highly recommend staying at this hostel no matter what kind of trip you’re looking for
Nice place to stay in the centre of Barcelona, close to Sagrada familia.  Nice and clean room. Very friendly and helpful staff. Everything perfect!

Review Title: Will be recommending this hostel to all my family and friends. Loved it!
Negative Reviews: Nothing :)
Positive Reviews: As my first hostel I have stayed in I was so impressed with the comfort and facilities. The staff made you feel so comfortable, I met so many people and the rooms were so clean and big.

Negative Reviews: nothing that comes to mind. it had everything we needed!
Positive Reviews: I love that it has a modern yet home feel to it. The dorm rooms offer a lot of privacy and a lot of space to store your stuff. love that each room has a shared bathroom. Staff were so friendly and gave lots of recommendations. The hostel is a 10 minute walk to the Sagrada Familia and about a 30 minute walk to the Gothic Quarter. The lounge area was perfect for when you weren’t quite ready to sleep but still wanted to chill out and chat without annoying your room mates. would definitely come here next time I visit Barcelona.

Negative Reviews: Nothing
Positive Reviews: Great staff, facilities, beds were very comfy and the whole place always very clean!

Review Title: When in Barcelona, this is the place to go
Positive Reviews: Everything was super clean, great facilities and the staff (shout-out to Pablo!) was always super nice and helpful.

Review Title: Affordable stay in the heart of BCN!
Negative Reviews:
- 6 bed female dorm - room was quite dark and not enough natural light 
- pool size - smaller than it looked in photos. Was more like a jacuzzi size 
- lifts were slow 
- need more single or double rooms por favor!
Positive Reviews:
Two things really stood out to me from this hostel that makes it like no other:

- They offered a free walking tours from the hostel (not in conjunction with any other tours). The historic tour took place at the gothic quarter of the city and what made it unique was that it was she first ever tour I've taken that gave me insight into the political unrest between Spain and Catalan.
- Location was impeccable! 15 mins from BCN train station by L5! Right in the heart of great food and a 24 hour convenience store opposite!  Whilst this may sound cliche as  other hostels may also be strategically positioned too, personally for me I felt the above was impeccable. 

Alongside the aforementioned, additionally, the staff were wonderful and the rooftop pool was great (pink??). 

Should I stay at a hostel again, I would opt to stay here again.

Review Title: Your best option if you come to BCN! ❣️
Negative Reviews:
Even if the cleaning was good enough and there is nothing to complain about it at all, I noticed one day they didn’t take trash out and either changed the sheets - details will always count.
The rooms were a bit dark - it be nicer if there will be a little more of light!
Positive Reviews:
By far one of the best hostels I’ve been in! Excellent location to move around the lovely Barcelona, amazing relation quality - price, nearby there are handy places to get stuff you missed, grab a drink, walk around, and Verdaguer metro station will be your best friend in your visit. You can have a huge breakfast for only 5 Euros, and enjoy the amazing activities the hostel has for your stay like walking tours and night parties to make friends. And the staff, the staff got 5 stars! They are the most friendly people in world and would listen to your needs and help you in whatever you need.

* If I Can only get the Catalan guy name and his instagram would be a plus 🙊

Negative Reviews: I was surprised that the upper beds didn't have curtains as opposed to the lower ones. I would definitely appreciate it. Also the lighting in the room isn't quite sufficient but at least it won't wake you up in the middle of the night.
Positive Reviews: Great location close to everything you might want to see in Barcelona. Very nice staff making you feel safe & comfortable. Affordable breakfast option and good WiFi.

Review Title: Yeah Barcelona is a hell ya for me!
Negative Reviews: I think it's hard to share a room with strangers, so next time I will try to book a room with friends to make it more pleasant while being in our room.
Positive Reviews: The location was perfect! Very Central. Felipe, the staff member who checked us in, was extremely kind, accommodating, and friendly. They have a great buffet and kitchen with friendly staff. I will definitely stay again next time I visit Barcelona! :) the vibe of those staying is very friendly.

Negative Reviews: The bed was comfortable, but I got the upper bed and the stairs were tricky I was afraid to fall.
Positive Reviews: The hostel was very well located, close to a lot of interesting places and public transport. The breakfast was very good for the price and the staff was soooo nice, everyone was very friendly and helpful. The common areas were very comfortable and spacious. I was able to keep my luggage, drink something refreshing and rest at the common areas before my check-in.

Review Title: Location is perfect, staff is helpful and kind, and has affordable options for dinner and breakfast.
Negative Reviews: Bathrooms are small. Clean, but small.
Positive Reviews: Location, staff, amenities, food, parking, guests.

Negative Reviews: Some minor problems: I slept on the upper bed and the stairs are really hard to climb. They are too narrow to rest my feet on. There's also hardly anything to hold on to. After a long walking day in Barcelona with aching legs, climbing upstairs can be a bit dangerous as I almost felt once. It would also be nice to be able to open the windows at night for more fresh air, not only by the staff in the morning.
Positive Reviews: Nice location, easy to reach with various bus and metro lines. The area is quite safe at night for single travellers. The room is clean and the bed is very comfortable. Staff are very friendly. I didn't use the kitchen and the public area, but they look really cozy! I'll totally recommend it!

Review Title: really great, would defo stay again
Negative Reviews: room was slightly hot but not really a complaint as we didn't ask them to fix it as it wasn't that bad- I'm sure the staff would help if we asked as they're very attentive
Positive Reviews: the room was really great, loads of storage and a bathroom and shower in each dorm. bed was comfy, staff were great, and location was ideal too. they held social events which would be great if travelling alone.

Negative Reviews: They don't offer tea or coffee outside of breakfast hours, even self-serve, and if you don't pay for the buffet you can only have one complimentary drink. The fridge was placed in the kitchen that staff also used, so I didn't feel encouraged to use it to store my own food. The hosts didn't explain a lot of things during check-in. The rooms were also really dusty for some reason, it stuck to my clothes and was in my hair.
Positive Reviews: The rooms were clean and modern, and each room had its own shower and bathroom, making it much more private and comfortable. The beds were comfy too. The staff was very friendly and helpful and made me feel comfortable during my stay. The hostel offers social dinners that made it easy to get to know new people, and the food was really good. The breakfast buffet, however, was not to my taste as it didn't have a lot of variety besides pancakes, bread, cereal and eggs, but that's just for me personally. The hostel also offers "walking tours" guided by hosts, which was a great way to get to know the city in a casual setting with other people from the hostel. The location of the hostel is also very good, in walking distance from Sagrada Familia, and other popular locations were easily accessible by public transport. The area felt quite safe even after midnight. There were good places to eat around as well.

Negative Reviews: There was a problem with our air conditioning. Our clothes and bedding were continuously damp. We were told to open the doors to our room to remove the humidity which would have defeated the purpose of air conditioning. The staff did try to help but never fixed the air conditioning problem. In lieu of being able to fix the air conditioning, the staff provided us with dry bedding for the two nights we needed it.
Positive Reviews: The staff was amazing and so was the morning breakfast. The room was very nicely decorated and clean. We had our own balcony which we used. Having the ability to do laundry was a bonus.

Negative Reviews:
Just some people we shared the room they are not kind and friendly. 
Over night they playing music and chatting over the laptop or mobile with light on when it's time for sleep, that's all.
Positive Reviews:
Everything was perfect and will go back again in summer time.
Staff were friendly, kind and helpful I really like all of them like David, Leo,Ely,Soraya, Anna,  Allah,Harry,Carlos the chef foods so nice and tasty. Also Cleaners made our room so nice and shined.

Negative Reviews: Wish there were more washrooms in the hallways to use when roommates are still sleeping. Breakfast was kinda blah. Same food every day. Gets old after a couple of days.
Positive Reviews:
Amazing review. Very clean. Bed super comfy. Staff very friendly and accommodating. Great location. Felt very safe being a solo female traveller. Loved the cozy 4 people female rooms with the private bath.

Overall great stay and will definitely return😁

Review Title: Another great stay here, super friendly and helpful staff, especially Pablo, he is the best guide in Barcelona. This hos
Negative Reviews: Maybe the lift, the staff know most people will comment on this
Positive Reviews: The staff were super helpful. Clean rooms and bathrooms. Good food and a great atmosphere to meet people. Pablo is the best guide in Barcelona!

Review Title: I am more than grateful to the entire team for professionalism
Negative Reviews: There is always where to improove, but I think the management/employees themselves know where. I'm satisfied with the staying
Positive Reviews:
Clean rooms, and bathrooms including shared toilets apart the rooms of staying, corridors, kitchen.

Comfortable coworking/lounge area with the big table, assessable plugs and fast WiFi. Whom wants or likes can work or chill on sofas. Hostel has rooftop with mini bar for sunbath, yoga or just chill. Hostel is adapted for the disabled. 

Hostel has walking tours and pub crawls. Nice experience not only for those whom are traveling with friends, but for solo travellers especially. 

Food provided by hostel: breakfast -  buffet that has choices: ham, omelette, fruits, cereal, drinks and etc. 
Dinners: everyday it is different meal with desert and ring, always have option for vegetarians and for persons with special dietary needs. 

Professional and helpful staff of the hostel. Solves problems, always gives advice if you asking something and generally spends/shares time with each guest.

Review Title: Stayed one night in Barcelona and it was luxurious, clean, and beautiful at Yeah Hostel.

Positive Reviews: Room was very spacious and clean. The location was in a safe and quiet neighborhood. The staff was helpful and knowledgeable. I loved that we were able to leave our luggage before and after checkout!

Negative Reviews: One toilet and one bathroom for 6 beds. Upper bunk bed is not easy to climb up with narrow wooden ladder.
Positive Reviews:
Strategic location. Metro L5 is 2 streets away, convenient to go anywhere in Barcelona with metro, including airports.
With aircond in room. Good and affordable breakfast at Euro7.

Review Title: for the price of money it is a pretty good place to stay
Negative Reviews: the sound isolation is not the best we could hear every word the neighbours were saying. also the beds were a little uncomfortable, every turn was followed up by a bed creaking. the window has no handle, need to ask a member of stuff to open and close it.
Positive Reviews: very clean place, well maintained and looked after. great dinner and breakfast facilities. liked the location.

Review Title: Nice stay for a good money
Negative Reviews: Bathroom might have been cleaner and generally needs to be refreshed
Positive Reviews: Although the room was not so spacious, beds were comfortable. You can have breakfast for only 5 euros (small kids eats for free!:) ) - for the price it's decent. What I've liked the most is tarrace and the pool there! And the fact, that it was very close to the major attractions of Barcelona

Negative Reviews:
The patio door handle was broken as was one of the bed reader lights. 

The woman desk lady was welcoming, thanks, the guys OKish. 

Not sure about the wrist bracket electronic door openers. The international standard is a card. 

The room was dim. A dimmer light where you can turn up the brightness if you want would have been nice. 

Hot water OKish.

All these are minor issues and very fixable. It's maybe why the rating has slipped from 9.4 to 9.1.
Positive Reviews:
Superb breakfast. All you can eat for 7 euros which is a bargain. Go outside the hostel and it will cost alot more. 

Very comfortable beds and everything new.

Location is within walking distance of many of Gaudi's attractions which is a great reason to stay here.

Negative Reviews:
There was a small shelf above at the headboards. This was great however the sliding panel to close it didn't work. 

I did the tour of the city. While it was informative, I found it a bit politically biased. The same information could have been presented (maybe it wouldn't have been as entertaining?) in a more balanced manner --especially since the tour guide  wasn't even from Barcelona. 

Not the hostel's fault but one roommate always came in after 3am and because he was drunk, he kept fumbling with the keys and woke everyone up.
Positive Reviews:
The place was exactly as described on booking.com. There was a little roofdeck with a lounge area and bar. There was a comfortable common lounge area just above the reception. In all common areas there were outlets to charge your phone and laptop. The beds were comfortable and the lockers right under the beds were very convenient. There were numerous pegs to hang coats, towels and other things. Access to the rooms was via a wristband--this made it very easy to find the key. Free cold (important in hot weather!!!) drinking water was always available. While I didn't take advantage of the meals, I thought it was great that the hostel offered affordable breakfast and dinner options. There were also many activities such as tours and pub crawls.

The location was great too. It was less than two blocks away from the nearest metro --  which was on the line directly from Sants station.

Negative Reviews: I think the bathroom in the room was not enough clean and for the price we pay which is already quite expensive it would have been nice to have breakfast included for example
Positive Reviews: Good bedrooms and beds ! Good breakfast and the employee were really nice and open to help at any moment

Negative Reviews: Remember that it is a hostel - your rommate can be noisy, gettng up early or come back late ;)
Positive Reviews: I really enjoyed my stay - for the second time in this place. The staff members of the hostel are very nice and friendly. Room was clean. There are tasty meals you can get together with other guests.

One of the best hostels we’ve been to - very modern,clean and lots of activities offered by the hostel. The pool on the roof is cooled and a great place to meet people! Extraordinary staff that really cares about your stay. Highly recommended!

My first tine staying at a hostel and it was amazing! The staff was more than friendly. The whole vibe of the hostel made me feel as if I was part of a big family. If you’re looking for a trendy, clean, budget-friendly accommodation in BCN? Then Yeah Hostel is the perfect fit?

Negative Reviews:
Location is OK, but not that great. Need to walk from 4-8 minutes to metro stations. 

Elevator: -3 - 7 floor for 1 elevator. Outside the elevator, there is no up and down button. Only ONE button, no indication to know if the elevator goes up or down and is at which floor.  All the combinations makes waiting elevator a long time and I don't know how long I will wait and should go to stairs or not. After gets  in, I don't know if the elevator will go up or down if there are others in it. Even there is only me, it may go to the opposite direction, cause some one outside the elevator may push button before I put the level button.  I never saw an elevator act like this, better change the elevator control system.
Positive Reviews:
Aisle of room is wide enough, whole floor of laminate flooring even public area, clean and confirmable. 
A small table in the room which is convenient while you just want to drink water or put stuff temporarily.
Design of the lunge in 1 floor is good, big enough, with sofa, big table, small tables, bed. Light and atmosphere is also good. Feel relax there.
Staff is great and helpful.

Review Title: Amazing experience in a friendly and safe environment
Negative Reviews: wifi was a little bit off at the top floors.

When I arrived sheets were smell amazing actually. locker from the top of the bed is also so logical and safe to use. Employees also so helpful and friendly they actually helped me to broke my locker because I was forgot the key into my cabinet, was so panicked but they just handled very quickly. especially if you are a solo traveller I definitely recommend!!!

Negative Reviews: The elevator is a minor inconvinience, but otherwise it is okay. You just gotta wait.

Review Title: fun, relaxing, interesting tour friendly people beautiful place I’d come back tomorrow if I could !

Positive Reviews: beautiful minimalist modern perfect for meeting people relaxing, or doing a little remote work even. clean comfy beds so important to have curtains and super friendly staff. group dinners are available although you must pay and I enjoyed the walking tour with Pablo. gréât hostel !

Positive Reviews: That was the best trip of my life! In this place you get to know so many new cool people, especially through the delicious dinners together. Perfect for solo travelers! I stayed in a 6 bed room for 7 days and it was cleaned every day. The staff were all very nice and open. I have to express special praise to Younes, who always had an open ear for me on the night shift and gave me a lot of useful tips. I will come again, beautiful Yeah hostel!

Negative Reviews:

Positive Reviews:
- It's  clean

Review Title: Central and clean hostel with awesome people
Negative Reviews: Include directions for parking on booking/website would be awesome. It is directly next to the hostel but you have to call ahead of time for them to open the door. Also, It would be awesome if there was a floor bathroom in addition to the ones in the rooms. That was really the only loud part- people getting up/coming in at different times and having to brush their teeth/shower/etc.
Positive Reviews: Great location, within walking distance of most everything in Barcelona. Very clean room with comfortable beds. Super nice people and I enjoyed the opportunity to meet people from around the world. They host group dinners, city tours, and outings which were really fun especially as a solo traveler. The area is very safe too, and I felt comfortable walking around as a solo female traveler. They offer parking on site which was amazing.

Review Title: A really nice hostel for short stays
Negative Reviews:
-Shower in rooms are not designed well, the floor flooded everytime someone would shower and the shower curtain did nothing
-Lift was broke for half of my stay and also took a very long time
-Lounge area closed at 12:30am. Told to move to the bar however the bar finishes at 12pm. Only 3 choices of drinks Water, Sangria or Estrella 
-I was on the 2nd floor and my room was just above the main entrance at a very loud junction, housekeeper would open the window at 10am and we would be woken by the noise of the cars and people below
-Breakfast is not good, not much selection (cold scrambled eggs, cold tortilla, watered down juice, some cereal, Greek yoghurt, apple, banana, pancake maker-best item!)
- My pub crawl night wasn’t great, 45 min wait for a drink in the club and vodka+coke was €18 
-No acknowledgement of Covid, no masks, no checking any vaccinations
Positive Reviews:
-Rooms cleaned very well every day
-Beds comfortable however 1 pillow is not enough, I had neck cramps every morning 
-Walking tour was very good with Pablo, the are free however you do need to tip at the end
-Pool area is a really nice vibe
-Staff are very welcoming and love to get to know you 
-All of the people are so nice, best way to mingle is the group dinner which is well worth €12 (starter, main, dessert, 3 drinks) food is really yummy I will miss it
- You can check out and leave your luggage in the luggage room however you can also stay in the hostel chill out areas and rooftop until you’re leaving for the airport

Review Title: Good choice as a hostel with improvements to be done
Negative Reviews: The public area is cool, but is always crowded and noisy; the window of the room can not be opened, which raise a big problem when you have a stinky roommate...; the location is ordinary; the elevator is not efficient.
Positive Reviews: The staff is generally nice, room well-equipped, the size of the toilet and the bathroom is satisfying compared to many other hostels; breakfast is nice; flexible check-in time and extended check-out time.

Negative Reviews: the bathroom space is a bit small to change clothes in, the wristbands are a bit inconvenient
Positive Reviews:
easily the best hostel I’ve ever stayed at. the staff is so kind but really what makes it so special are all the opportunities they provide their guests to meet each other. 

from the walking city tour, the dinner (which is easily such a bang for your buck) and the pub crawl offered every day/night, other guests easily become friends. 

yeah hostel provides so much value from comfort (the rooms are nice and beds comfy), social atmosphere, community, and showing you around the city. 

love love love this hostel and everyone there! if I visit again, I’ll be back ❤️

Review Title: Loved the stay. Could have been slightly better
Negative Reviews: I did not like that the cleaning staff did not seem to know who was staying for extra days and who has checked out. Multiple items of mine were thrown out as well as other guests. I do not believe this was theft, I think it was just due to quick turn around.
Positive Reviews: I really liked this hostel because the rooftop bar / pool is easy to meet people and the view is spectacular. I found check in easy and the staff very friendly. They have great deals on food and meals.

Negative Reviews: The fit between the foot of the bed and wall was about 7 inches making it a squeeze to walk to the other side of the room
Positive Reviews: Location, breakfast, and helpful staff

Negative Reviews: The bathroom in our room could have been cleaner but it didn't impact our stay. The lockers were NOT SECURE at all. Although we could put our valuables in an under bed locker and pad lock it after one night's sleep we realised you could reach into the locker through the bed frame easier than actually unlocking the locker.
Positive Reviews: Fantastic location and a lovely place to stay. Surrounding area felt safe and had some beautiful restaurants and cafes. Some of the staff were extremely fun and helpful

Negative Reviews: Couple of nights the air conditioning at night was way too cold, the lift a bit too slow.
Positive Reviews: The location is amazing and the staff super friendly and fun! The dinner at night is the perfect time to make new friends and I enjoyed also the pub crawl! I also joined the breakfast every morning. It's a few steps from the metro and the beautiful Gracia neighborhood. I really recommend it.

Negative Reviews: The water in the shower took too long to heat up
Positive Reviews: The food, the tours, the location, the friendly staff

Negative Reviews: The water in the shower took too long to heat up
Positive Reviews: The food, the tours, the location, the friendly staff

Review Title: i loved the hostel and especially staff, they were extremely welcoming helpful and kind
Negative Reviews: i did not like upstairs bed the stairs werenot very comfortable
Positive Reviews: i liked location, the hostel, staff, food, pool …

Negative Reviews: Ventilation in the room is not good. The frowst as well as the cough and sniffing sound made me feel bad.
Positive Reviews: Very friendly and staff, safe location, delicious breakfast. You don't have to bring a towel, because you can rent it from the reception at a very low price.

Negative Reviews: The bunk bed: it was not easy to get up to the top bed, it did not feel safe. The room was not clean when I arrive, it might be from the people who were already in the room but wasn’t clean.
Positive Reviews: the location was very good. their staff were very kind and helpful, kitchen was good. they had evening activities and dinners which was very nice (I didn’t join but seemed very nice).

Negative Reviews:
The first day hot shower was not working, but they solved my problem sending me to other room to take a shower and the next day, there's hor water in my room as well. I just thing the size of shower room was too small. 

Just an observation, I was trying to find a female room but it was not available anymore. It's not acoomodation problem bu i didn't like to share the room with other men, specially because they were not higienic.
Positive Reviews: The free tours was INCREDIBLE, best experience. Leo with the Gothic tour and the other tall guy and handsome guy (i don't remember the name now hahaha) with Modern tour both were incredible. The hostel is a perfect stay if you're traveling alone, there's many ways of making friends, and everybody is very friendly, dinners, nights out, tours... Is you visiting, do not miss the rooftop, the view (specially at night) is incredicle. Hope to be back soon. Oh, and its close to metro and bus stop, the area is very safe, so don't worry.

Review Title: The first and good hostel experience
Negative Reviews: Cons: if you sleep on a bottom bed and you have somebody sleeping on the top bed, it can be noisy every time a person on the top turns around and the bed makes noises, but not too much. Anyway, you will wake up in a hostel room during a night when somebody enters the room, uses the bathroom etc. But all these were expected, so, no surprise.
Positive Reviews:
It was my first hostel experience ever and I stayed in a 6-bed mixed room.
Pros: good service, friendly staff, clean bedroom, kitchen and bathroom, useful storage right at the top of beds. The best hostel environment I could imagine.

Negative Reviews:
Wifi not great in some rooms. 
Some in room showers are very small.
Positive Reviews:
Excellent staff! 
Walking tours with Pablo was exceptional!! 

Very clean

Review Title: Very comfortable and fun hostel int he heart of Barcelona
Positive Reviews:
The staff and location were great. Walking distance to metro and sagrada.
They organized some common activities to help people get to know each other such as walking tours, dinners and bar crawls. The bar crawl was a lot of fun and would definitely recommend it.

Negative Reviews: Can't think of anything
Positive Reviews: Facilities are great, breakfast and dinner, great value for money, good location. Lovely staff.

The location is really good, you can find supermarkets, bars, cafes just around the block. They hold different activities basically everyday, so you can get to know a lot of new friends. 
I joined one social dinner, the Paella was sooo yummy, thank you chef! 
The city tour also an amazing experience, our tour guide Mario is really nice, he’s full of passion, told us a lot history/ culture behind the buildings which help us got to know the city better :)

Review Title: I definitely will stay here again. I love the proximity to major sites and the food was delicious as
Negative Reviews: I don't have anything that i dislike about my stay here.
Positive Reviews: My first hostel stay and i definitely will stay here again. Great location AMAZING and interactive staff. I met great friends here and all because this hostel hosts group get togethers like free walking tour, bar crawl and dinner night. The food was delicious, especially dinner night.
Staff  , location , food , lobby

Review Title: Exceptional hostel to stay for the true Barcelona experience filled with friends and food
Positive Reviews:
Yeah Hostel Barcelona is centrally located near all the main attractions of Barcelona. There's lot of good eateries and bars around. The hostel is just amazing and incomparable to anything I've ever stayed at. The best part is the people. The people that work there and the people that you'll meet there. You might arrive as a stranger but you'll definitely leave with a lot of friends.
The breakfast and dinners at the hostel restaurants are also really good. They also organize guided tours. Pablo, the tour guide is amazing and will take you through the entire history of Barcelona in just 2 hours. An experience that you will definitely cherish.

Negative Reviews: Guys at front desk wasn’t as helpful if you weren’t a girl.
Positive Reviews: Very clean  and great location. Lady’s at front desk and guy in the kitchen were awesome , caring and helpfull.

Review Title: Ok but I won't take a dorm bed next time even if I travel alone.
Negative Reviews: As it was a dorm, it was a bit noisy as people stayed up late and moved around, which was difficult to sleep. The air-condition was too cold the first day although it was 30 degree outside. The private bathroom was not cleaned up during 2 days I stayed there, so it stayed wet and dirty as many people used it.
Positive Reviews: The staffs were helpful. There was a small bar to socialize with other travelers. Good location.

Review Title: Value for money, but not as comfy as expected
Negative Reviews: Dorms lack areas for changing clothes. The bunk beds are not so comfortable
Positive Reviews: Good location. Cooperative staff. Elevators.

Negative Reviews: Smelly and small rooms. unfortunately i had to deal with drunk young guys and asian people eating in the room but I guess thats just bad luck. you can feel when your neighbours move, breath or just land on the bed. most of the nights I wasnt able to sleep. I consider the price is high for a hostel.
Positive Reviews: great location! thanks to Lucia and Eli for an outstanding service at reception! eli went above and beyond to make me feel better!! lounge area and rooftop were nice. the staff was great!!

Negative Reviews: All is great, one thing l am concerned is that the stair of the bed is a little hard. And the curtain in the shower room is easy to connected  with body, and maybe good if it have a heavy colgante.
Positive Reviews: 24h Staff is really very good. And the location is excellent, you can walk to the most popular bywalk. And the facilities are good enough within the dormitory. All good👍

Negative Reviews: The shower system: the water came out from the shower plate and it made the whole  floor  really wet.
Positive Reviews: Lovely place, good staff, beautiful facilities and location.

Negative Reviews: All is great, one thing l am concerned is that the stair of the bed is a little hard. And the curtain in the shower room is easy to connected  with body, and maybe good if it have a heavy colgante.
Positive Reviews: 24h Staff is really very good. And the location is excellent, you can walk to the most popular bywalk. And the facilities are good enough within the dormitory. All good👍

Review Title: Fantastic hostel! Clean, cool and friendly
Negative Reviews: The only reason Im not giving a 10 is there were very little vegan options at breakfast and none for the evening meal, but they do have veggie options for both.
Positive Reviews: Staff were so friendly! There's a really nice sense of community at Yeah. Walking tours during the day and nights out together make it easy to connect. The whole place was spotlessly clean. My bed was so comfy and the shower was great. Location is perfect, lots to do in walking distance. 24/7 reception and security, I felt so safe as a female solo traveller. I would definitely return!

Review Title: I totally recommend this place for its location and amenities.
Negative Reviews: Earlier breakfast for early birds like me could have been better.
Positive Reviews: Location, cleanliness, staff, guests.

Review Title: One of the very best hostel
Negative Reviews: Water takes a lot to heat in th shower
Positive Reviews: Clean room, have curtains for the bed, good buffet breakfast, very good dinners, location, amazing city tour offered by the hostel !

Negative Reviews:
U couldn’t control the air conditioning or the door being opened and closed in your room I came back with a severe throat ace because
Of how cold the rooms where during the night
Positive Reviews:
So many activities and everyone gets together during dinner and the pub crawls everyday terrace is cool very social place and the game area with tv and people sit around you can easily meet people 
Great view from the room aswell
Very clean

Negative Reviews: Maybe the fact that the hand washer is not isolated from the beds and also the bed that I got was difficult to access.
Positive Reviews: The treatment of the personal. The location. The cleanness. The activities that the hostel offers. The food. Everything was very good.

Negative Reviews: The room window is under staf control. Which means we cannot open the window and get fresh air whenever we want.
Positive Reviews: It is a clean hostel with good personel.  Location is also good. You can reach to many must see places by walking. And breakfast is satisfying as well.

Negative Reviews: Maybe the fact that the hand washer is not isolated from the beds and also the bed that I got was difficult to access.
Positive Reviews: The treatment of the personal. The location. The cleanness. The activities that the hostel offers. The food. Everything was very good.

Negative Reviews: The windows had to be closed after a certain time and it was very sad. The room was not smelling really well (a person had dirty clothes) and well, a window opened would had helped.
Positive Reviews: The staff that work in the restaurant/bar is SO kind! They have such a lovely energy!

Negative Reviews: It got very hot and stuffy in the rooms at night. Ventilation or the possibility to open a window would've been good.
Positive Reviews: Hostel with very friendly staff and lots of possibilities to engage with other visitors. Possibility to buy breakfast and dinner on site. guided tours organized as well as bar crawls. But not a party hostel, so still possible to get a good nights sleep.

Negative Reviews: The only small complaint that I have is about the madress , it needs to be turned or renewed, because it was very uneven and hard, since I could feel the hard bottom of the bed when lying down
Positive Reviews: Fantastic hostel, really modern facilities and the staff is very kind and helpful. Good breakfast as well.

Negative Reviews: Nothing, loved everything
Positive Reviews: I really enjoyed the friendliness cleanliness and all the activities were really fun. The breakfast and dinners were really good and not expensive. Place really clean and spacious awesome location.

Breakfast was good enough for the price. All facilities and cleanliness were top notch. Amazing location - close to the subway station and all basic amenities like supermarket, pharmacy, sim shops, restaurants were nearby.

Review Title: Would surely go back if I would visit Barcelona again.
Negative Reviews: Nothing at all!
Positive Reviews: First of all the quality for a Hostel is insane. The beds are great (allthough the pillows are really soft), there’s plenty of storage space, the location of the hostel is insane with a metro closeby and the Segrada Familia around the corner. The people were instantly welcoming and energetic young guys. The living room is great to crash after a long day. Even de showers were nice and warm and that for this price. Ate dinner once which was really cheap and so good! You get 3 courses and drinks included where you also meet a lot of people. The breakfast is a buffet and worth the money. You can also during the day grab coffee or tea for free which is great. Overall 10/10. Don’t forget to attend the walking tour either. Pablo will take you through the Gothic quarters and learn you all about the history in a fun way. Really energetic and a lovely non-boring tour!

Review Title: Lovely and well sustained hostel in the central area
Positive Reviews: Hotel-Alike Hostel, located in the central area, close to several famous tourist sites. The room is clean, and well equipped with spacious beds, toilet and bathroom are separated in each room, therefore it is much more convenient and avoid slippery toilet.  Meanwhile, they offer breakfast and dinner, especially for dinner, which is a good opportunity to enjoy local food and chat with people from different parts of the world. In general, I am quite satisfied with this experience.

Review Title: Budget friendly accomodation and will stay again.
Positive Reviews: Centrally located within walking distance to many tourist attractions, close to many restaurants and supermarkets. The hostel is new, clean, well designed facilities. I had a comfortable stay and strongly recommend.

Negative Reviews: Only reception can open door at main enterance.Somes times you have to wait. Not key for Locker.
Positive Reviews:
It is Great Hostel. Clean, Comfortable. Showe and WC in the room. Have a nice rooftop with pool. Good breakfast for 7 eur. Nice facilities. Mainly night tour to the bars and clubs with free shots. 
Location also not bad.
The hostel is very clean and well located in Barcelona. It's possible to reach all the major attractions and places by walk. The breakfast is very good with a large choice of food.

Nice clean and quiet rooms with cosy beds that have courtains that offer you privacy. Big storage place under the beds with possibility to lock them with your lock or if you don´t have you can buy at the hostel. The location is good about 10 minutes from sagrada familia and 2 minutes from the metro. The rooms have their own bathroom, toilet and faucet which means that your totally independent. They also have a good place to relax, study etc in the first floor and a bar to have a drink.

Negative Reviews: nothing
Positive Reviews:
great location
fast free wifi
room and communal areas clean
air conditioning
breakfast good value for money
rooftop pool

Negative Reviews: Location
Positive Reviews:
The location was good. The staff was friendly 
The only thing I did not like was that they decided when to open/close the door of our room balcony. Which was not nice.

Negative Reviews:
The location not very good a bit far from the metro
station and not much supermarket or restaurant around 
the hostel.
The room was very dark with just one small light in the
room.
Positive Reviews:
It was my first experience being in a hostel in Europe and
the staff are very nice and welcoming, they usually have
events and night tours, and also 3 course dinner with 
drink and also breakfast at a reasonable price.
The bed has a big drawer where you can fit your suitcase
and use your padlock to lock. Hostel is nicely decorated.
overall was a nice experience for a first time.

Negative Reviews: bed uncomfortable, some staff were not as friendly
Positive Reviews: it was clean and people were friendly

Negative Reviews: Location was not dead center, but everything was still very easily reachable by Metro.
Positive Reviews:
Great hostel, super friendly staff, and nice and clean rooms! Shower and toilet are in the room so you only share with your roommates, which is a big plus. Very comfy beds too.
Had the 5€ breakfast one morning and it was great value for your money. Also joined the free walking tour with Pablo and it was so fun to meet new people and very informative! If that‘s not enough you can also join their pub crawls, recommend if you wanna go out with more people from the hostel. All in all great experience!

Negative Reviews: Only thing I can fault is the location as it’s slightly further out from the centre (i.e most things are a 30min walk), but the metro is about 10mins walk if you prefer that. Also be careful as Google Maps takes you the wrong way. Instead, head to Verdaguer metro and then walk up Carrer de Girona for about 10mins and it will be on your right.
Positive Reviews: I stayed in 6-bed women’s room and it was great! Comfy beds, lower bunk has a curtain, plenty charging points, separate bathroom & shower. The common areas are also nice. All-you-can-eat breakfast buffet for €7 and dinner/drinks for €15. Everyone is really friendly and the vibes are great.

Review Title: It was okay. Would not recommend it again.
Negative Reviews:
I arrived at 7 in the morning at the hostel because I took the night bus from Bordeaux. I asked if I could pay for half a day and stay get a bed. I already did a booking for the same day but the checkin time was at 3 pm. They said they can't do that as their policy doesn't allow that. Then I asked if I could stay in the lounge area till the time city opens up because like where can you go at 7 am in the morning to spend your time? Guess what?? They said NO. Like what? All in all, I had to leave th hostel at 0730 in the morning EVEN THOUGH I HAD MADE MY BOOKING. THIS WAS BY FAR SHITTEST EXPERIENCE I HAD IN ANY HOSTEL ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD.

At the reception also, people were were very non caring. They gave more of hotel vibe than hostel vibe.  Out of 3 staff members I met during one night stay, only one smiled and gave helpful information to travel around the city.
Positive Reviews: It's clean, Superb Location, and the breakfast is worth every penny. Honestly, I went during the offseason and the stay was good but I had an experience that just left a bad taste. Also, the shower is was not clean and the room lacks enough light, making to room dark. Precaution: If you are arriving super early, avoid booking this hostel. They won't allow early check-in, nor do they accept half-day payments. Oh, and they don't even allow you to stay in the lounge area before check-in even though you have paid. Oh and reserve the rooms online. NO walk-in's are allowed and do the booking at the reception.

Review Title: A lovely and easy stay at Yeah hostel
Negative Reviews: The room is quite humid, even with only 4 people and you are not really allowed to open the windows and atleast in our room the AC was ot very powerful. The reception was very nice and gave us the handle to open the window for a sec, but ofcourse the humidity comes back the second someone takes a shower. Still being the biggest flaw during my January stay I would come back here.
Positive Reviews: The hostel seems quite peaceful (in January) with still program every day for those who want to participate. I really liked that there are toilets and showers in every (?) room, and their lounge area works very well during the day if you have to work a bit. Extra points for the nice rooftop with a view and a small pool. I still feel intrigued to go for a quick dip.

Negative Reviews:
The rooms are
not aired over the night it gets really hot and humid. The centralized airing system
doesnt really work so during the night I woke up many times feeling there is no air and really hot. The windows cannot be open.
Positive Reviews:
The rooms were really nice, as well as
common
spaces. The locations is perfect!

Negative Reviews: Aircon in the room was not working properly, and there was no way to open the windows.
Positive Reviews: Comfy beds, lockers, shower in the room. The attic space was perfect for working. Not a party hostel. Location was good too.

Review Title: A lovely and easy stay at Yeah hostel
Negative Reviews: The room is quite humid, even with only 4 people and you are not really allowed to open the windows and atleast in our room the AC was ot very powerful. The reception was very nice and gave us the handle to open the window for a sec, but ofcourse the humidity comes back the second someone takes a shower. Still being the biggest flaw during my January stay I would come back here.
Positive Reviews: The hostel seems quite peaceful (in January) with still program every day for those who want to participate. I really liked that there are toilets and showers in every (?) room, and their lounge area works very well during the day if you have to work a bit. Extra points for the nice rooftop with a view and a small pool. I still feel intrigued to go for a quick dip.

Negative Reviews: Electricity was lost a few times, the air was a little bad in the rooms (unable to open window) and I was missing slightly more plant-based alternatives at the breakfast.
Positive Reviews: Clean rooms, extremely helpful staff, a nice city tour, guitars you could borrow and laundry availability.

Negative Reviews: There are no towels in rooms, but you can rent one at the reception. It is forbidden to leave your window at night (it is a hostel rule), so sometimes was a little too fuggy in the room.
Positive Reviews: Staff is always happy to help and chill! 😌 They explained some things about our stay and city at all. Breakfast was good value for money (7e), everything was fresh and tasted good. It is perfect place because of its location (10min walk from Sagrada and 2 minutes walk from few bus stations). If you are young and travelling with friends, this is more than a  perfect place for you.

Review Title: Perfect accommodation for comfortable budget trip!
Negative Reviews: I booked the 6-bed female room and I felt that only one bathroom is not enough for six people. I would have been better if the hotel could separate the toilet and the showering room. Anyway, the bathroom is relatively spacious and clean.
Positive Reviews: The hotel is located at the corner of the street near Verdaguer station which is quite safe and convenient if you travel alone; moreover, there are convenient store and several restaurant near by. The staffs are very service mind and eager to help.

Negative Reviews: Free breakfast would be nice.
Positive Reviews: Friendly and helpful staff, great bedrooms and facilities.

Review Title: Comfortable, safe, friendly, helpful and I would definitely go back and recommend to others
Negative Reviews: Breakfast,  I am vegan and couldn't eat much.  The fruit was unripe and one of the few things I could eat
Positive Reviews: The lovely helpful people. I felt they looked after me and helped me as a family member would.  Also the simple.safe systems, door locks, security,  provisions everything you need you can get or is provided.  Living room, laundry room, conversion plugs, towels, fridge space cooking facilities hot water, elevator also luggage storage.  We left for 2 days, leaving our luggage and came back. Clean loved the lights, curtains and phone charger in each bed

Negative Reviews: The rooms were very stuffy at times, and the air-con would turn off automatically after 10 min or so, not sure if that could be changed...
Positive Reviews: Ideally located in the city centre, easily accessible to sightseeing spots like Sagrada Familia and metro stations. Rooms were very comfy, lockers had plenty of space which was a plus. The hostel was also very good at organising events/activities like dinners, tours and barcrawls, so very supportive if you're a solo traveller looking to meet new people.

Negative Reviews:
It was very clairaudient. He here everything. Also when the guest from the other room are talking. We couldn't open and close the window by our own. The window was open the whole day and closed the whole night. That was very awkward.
The washbasin is based in the room. That's not good because you here every time if someone is washing something or washing their teeth. The rooms are very small.
Positive Reviews: Nice stuff. Clean room. They have a tasty dinner you can get together with other guests. Like that you can get to know each other. It is good that the beds have curtains. Like that you have your private space. You also have your own plug socket.

Negative Reviews: Lighting in bed is too dim, I can't read
Positive Reviews: UBS ports in bed; shower room rack for guests to put stuff while having shower; excellent WiFi; near Metro; shower room / washroom / washing basins are in separate units; good value buffet b'fast (€7); huge storage under bed.

Review Title: Pleasant stay at a nicely designed hostel!
Negative Reviews: The toilet and the shower inside the rooms do not have a window and the ventilator was not working well. Also although it was November, the temperature was high and there was no fresh air in the room, as air conditioning was -of course- not functioning. The windows in the rooms also do no open unfortunately.
Positive Reviews: The Hostel is well connected with the Metro and is easily accessible. Rooms are equipped with toilet and shower. Each bed has its own drawer, to keep personal items and luggage. Breakfast is quite good and is served at the main lobby area, close to the kitchen.

Review Title: Superb, best hostel I have been to so far
Negative Reviews: The lift (elevator) was a bit small and we had to wait cause it was used a lot, but we could use the stairs, it was not a big deal.
Positive Reviews: I stayed in 4 different hostels withing 8 days in Europe, Yeah Barcelona hostel is the only one that I would give 10/10, simply empty of any imperfection, the location, staff, rooftop view/vibe, and all the programs that they offer like dinner, city tour, pub crawl ...etc. as a solo traveler I felt like I had a family there, everyone was so nice, I enjoyed my time so much, the hostel certainly exceeded my expectations.

Review Title: Can’t say I’d rush back to be honest
Negative Reviews: Location, friendliness  and cleanliness were all very good .
Positive Reviews: The Hostels staff could not be more polite or friendly .I found my room to be very noisy as the showers were in the same  room .The water was constantly running on after flushing .The sink was also in the room .Noise noise noise .The bed was like sleeping on a snooker table .Too hard and really bad for back sufferers .

Review Title: Really nice hostel, perfect for making friends
Negative Reviews:
I didn’t like how was structured the room, there isn’t a door that split the beds and the “bathroom”, it’s really inconvenient that if you brush you teeth or put on your make up you cannot have a bit of privacy. 
Also you cannot open the window by yourself and sometimes with six people the smell of the room is not the best
Positive Reviews:
I liked a lot the staff, they are really welcoming and helpful. They organize many activities and I enjoyed a lot the morning tour with Pablo.
The hostel is nice and well kept, the rooms are clean

Negative Reviews: The room allocation - 3 23/24 year old girls and a 55 year old man in our room made us feel very uncomfortable, and it was awkward getting ready and returning at night. It would be better if there was an age cap or individuals of the same age and gender were put in the same room. Also, shower lock was very stiff.
Positive Reviews: Layout of rooms, amount of storage and having an ensuite bathroom was very nice. Beds were comfortable and staff friendly and helpful with recommendations. Social events fun and well organised

Negative Reviews: The other staff were ok, it was like they were doing us a favor everytime we tried to speak with them. We had two big cleaning problems and they offered us the towels for free and honestly I don't think it was enough. The kitchen during the breakfast and dinner is a bit tricky to use since there's always a staff member using the kitchen to cook/clean. One of the cooks was not nice at all when we tried to use the kitchen during dinner and we were not even cooking anything.
Positive Reviews: The receptionist Soraia was really nice, the hostel itself is really cozy and the room was great. The beds confortable. The room was exactly what we were expecting and the size is quite good. There's lots of space to keep your things under the bed. The terrace is a plus, the pool is small but the area is quite nice.

Review Title: This hostel had a nice atmosphere and location.
Negative Reviews: The space for each bed is small and I wasn't able to sit up straight on the bed because there wasn't enough space. The lighting also wasn't the best. My room didn't get much sunlight and the light in the room was very dim.
Positive Reviews: The location is awesome - it is located in a safe area in Barcelona with access to the metro within a few minutes of walking. The staff and other guests were also very friendly.

Negative Reviews: Upper beds, noise (you could hear people talking next room), quality of towels (extra paid), extra paid lockers
Positive Reviews: Location, lounge (nice design, spacious), reception and friendly staff, terrace❤️

Negative Reviews: They provide the usual skimpy towels for rent - and not enough hooks to hang them up in the rooms. The rooms have the bathroom inside them and the sink isn't separated from the room by a door, although this didn't seem to wake me up; you'd get more exposed to light if you were sleeping next to the sink.
Positive Reviews: Great central location, excellent cheap dinner and drinks option and free tour (I didn't do the tour), good breakfast (not included), clean. Had the usual lockers under the beds and a curtain for privacy (on the lower bunk beds only so make sure to request one).

Review Title: Some details could have been managed better.
Negative Reviews: There is no towel and shampoo in the rooms (they renting towels), housekeeping crew taking out balcony door handle at 7pm (they say use to a/c for fresh air - really I'm surprised), price
Positive Reviews: Good location, near to restaurant and supermarket, cozy beds, plug on beds

Negative Reviews: room temperature was sometimes too cold sometimes too hot, and could have had a towel on the bathroom floor
Positive Reviews: cleanliness, location, towels in the bedroom and breakfast

Negative Reviews: The parking was a bit of a challenge - quite narrow (but i guess that is what you get when you come to Barcelona by car:)).
Positive Reviews: The room was spacious and light and even though there were 6 of us there was plenty of space. Location was good, close to a metro station but also within walking distance to most attractions, plus there are a lot of cafes, restaurants and shops around.

Review Title: Friendly staff, cheap breakfast, good Wi-fi
Negative Reviews:
- I found the daily dinner offer a bit pricey at 12€ + 3 drinks included (as they've offered), but maybe that's just me be cheap 😁
- they have a bar downstairs (where the breakfast and dinner is being served), sadly they don't offer any drinks there. So it looks cool on pictures, but it's not an actual bar.
- you can't open the windows/balcony doors in your rooms by yourself. Simply not possible, asked the staff member at the front desk and they said only the cleaning staff opens and closes it again. If it's open, you can't even close it by yourself. 
- the pub crawl (Sunday) was a bit underwhelming. Again price is a bit high (20 Euro for dinner + pub crawl OR 15 Euro only the pub crawl). We've been to 2 clubs (free entrance, included in the price) and got 1 free shot at the first club - where the beer has cost 6€...
Positive Reviews:
Some positive key points: 
- The WiFi was very good
- The showers, they are in the rooms, are very good. 
- room had a hair dryer
- bed was comfortable. You have a socket at every bed and can also lock something in
- the breakfast, at 5€, is cheap and nice. you get coffee, juice, 2 kinds of bread, omelette, crossaints, cake, spanish tortilla, different cereals, milk, cheese, salami, jam... you can make your own toasted sandwiches & pancakes.
- there's a lounge with a big table and also a little desk where you can work 
- it's a 1 or 2 min walk to the nearest metro station Verdaguer and a 5 min walk to the Sagrada Familia. But it's quite the walk to La Rambla, takes about 20-25 Mins.
- theres a "Lidl" supermarket around the corner and a small supermarket just across the hostel, literally across the street.

Review Title: Hostel with a good potential but many issues
Negative Reviews:
Weird security: there is no way to enter the building until the receptionist lets you in. Why not use fobs?
No towels. Why do hostels assume people don't use towels? Why is this something paid extra? Ridiculous.
Weird housekeeping: every morning and evening a housekeeping lady enters the room (yes, simply opens the door and enters the room) to open/close the balcony door. Is this a kindergarten? Can't guests decide themselves when they want to have fresh air?
Sink in the room - why do hostels do that? This is a terrible, terrible solution. You will wake up whenever someone washes hands or brushes teeth, etc. Toilet doesn't have a bidet and a sink. How about hygiene? Not required at the hostel?
In general this is a hostel with a good potential, but all these issues are very frustrating.
Positive Reviews: Good location. Sturdy and comfortable bunk beds with curtains, which gives you your own "cell" space. A perfect solution for hostels, in my opinion.

Negative Reviews: The first night my towel went missing and they didn't seem to care and didn't want to switch my room.

You could turn the a/c on and off but temp controlled by reception and sometimes room got cold at 21 degrees all the time. I wasn’t sure whether we could use the kitchen (and didn’t ask) as chef was there group meals at morning and evening.
Positive Reviews: This is the first hostal in 3 months of travelling that goes above and beyond to create a good experience and sense of community for travellers. I spent a week here and did 2 walking tours (with Pablo), they provide nightly dinners and breakfasts (for a charge), there’s a lounge area on level one and the rooftop area. The beds are very comfortable with huge lockers to store your pack and all your belongings in, a bathroom in each room, power and light. Great blockout curtains in the room and bottom bunks (but felt sorry for upper bunks which don’t have a curtain). Close to a metro stop and not too far from main train station.

I had an absolute amazing time in Barcelona because of Yeah hostel. Doing a solo trip has been an item on my new year resolution for a long time but I always have a cold feet at the last minute. My stay in yeah hostel is the best decision I’ve made. 
The people and activities here are amazing. 


I had my first dinner in the hostel and the food is so great. Meanwhile, with the fantastic staff, the vibe of the dinner is fire (Shout out to wesing, sorry if I get your name wrong man, you are the best). Wesing has such great energies and a big heart. If you got him in the bar crawl, you would definitely have an awesome time. Here, you will get to know people traveling across the world and make great friends. 

In the morning, I booked myself to the walking tour which has different themes on different days. The old town walking tour is absolutely fantastic ( shout out to Pablo🫶). Our guide Pablo is such a top notch and told us about the all the history behind those gorgeous buildings. Moreover, all the staff here are all very warm-hearted and friendly. Whenever I need advice for the place to go or directions, they are always very willing to help and thanks to them, I had a wonderful time in Barcelona (Shout out to Pablo again, man you are amazing 🫶). Here, I had some of the most unforgettable beautiful memories in my life and to be honest if I will ever be back to this lively city, I’ll definitely choose yeah hostel. I really hope all the staff here all the best and I realllllllly hope to see you guys again.

In the bedrooms, they lock all windows shut and the air in the room spoils quickly. It was so bad, I had to leave.

Review Title: Unbearable experience and left first thing in the morning
Negative Reviews:
Unfortunately this has been an unbearable experience for me that only 2-3 hours after arrival, I canceled the rest of my stay at this hostel. I had to pay 2 nights plus a penalty fee, but I'd rather lose money than staying here. Note that this is not my first hostel experience. In the past I had stayed in hostels (both female and mixed) in 8 countries, so this is not a hostel newbie complaining about a brand new experience here.

Upon arrival everything was ok. Every time the card unlocks the door it makes some kind of ringing sound which would potentially wake up someone sleeping. I arrived around 22:30ish. Soon after I settled in the room, a guy arrived in the same room and immediately went to poop in the toilet inside the room. The smell was overwhelmingly strong and disgusting, but the window of the room cannot be opened. It is not allowed to be opened during the night, apparently, so it was locked. The entire room was filled with the pungent odour of this guy's poop right in my face. There was no way out. It is not the guy's fault, but who would have designed such a room with the toilet inside while there is no possibility to open the window? From the air quality point of view, the room is a giant toilet with 6 beds in it, enclosed, air-tight. I had to inhale this air while trying to sleep in bed and not to gag. And since the toilet is in the room, every tiny sound you make in the toilet would be heard from everyone in the room. Including the sound of wiping. And many other sorts of embarrassing sounds. 

More people arrived in the meantime and I soon realised that I was the only female in this mixed room. This felt quite strange, as the gender proportion is way off. I changed into my pyjama in the shower which is also inside the room, next to the toilet. It was a small, wet and awkward space, unlike many other hostels where the shower room is separated from the room and has much more space.

All above combined made me decide to leave ASAP.

Review Title: Exceptional. Great standard, like staying in a good Hotel.
Negative Reviews: Receptionist can range from fun and engaging types to not very engaged.
Positive Reviews: [Stayed in 4-Bed mixed dormitory]. Clean, modern and well equipped rooms, bathroom, reception and common rooms. Gold standard when it comes to Hostels, better than some hotels if you stayed alone. Very happy with amenities and design of rooms. Plenty of locker space and storage in the bunks. Beds are great and room spacious. Large and decorated common spaces and dinning areas. This room also has a large window to allow for better air flow. Hostel can be located easily and location is quiet.

Review Title: totally recommend, had an awesome stay here
Positive Reviews:
loved staying here , my room was beautiful with lovely city views . I like that the beds in shared dormitories have curtains and lockers . I personally witnessed the cleaning crew  clean every day - splendid . 
There’s a pool upstairs and bar open on evenings  . . 
I do wish however the bar was opened a little longer -especially on weekends :/ . Anyway I’d recommend staying here the location is great too , easily accessible by metro and Bus .

Review Title: Wonderful! Wish I had booked more days here! Incredible hospitality, lovely ‘family dinner’ and fun pub crawl with Felip
Positive Reviews: Nicely furnished, comfortable, good location, close to a metro station, great facilities - dining room, chill area, terrace with bar and small pool, feels safe

very nice hostel. very social with great activities that make it easy to meet people if you are travelling alone. Rooms are very clean and personnel are very nice! great location for getting around and discovering less popular spots on barcelona. Would strongly recommend:)

Negative Reviews: The top bunks don't have a privacy curtain and there wasn't too many gf choices at breakfast
Positive Reviews: The staff are all so friendly, Shout out to jake especially! Social area is fab. They put so much effort into the evening meals with proper chefs. The rooms are clean and the beds were so comfy. Awesome rooftop pool area although the pool is freezing. There were no tours when I was there but think that's because of covid as they do do them I think which would be good.

Negative Reviews: The food was good on some days but other days it was a touch underwhelming. It is good value for money but the food could be a bit better
Positive Reviews: it was very clean and good value for money. I also liked the friendly staff and the events they organised.

Review Title: It was fun, I love the curtains, lights and cubby in each bed

Positive Reviews: I liked that it was clean, we could make tea anytime, staff was very helpful and Iinformative

Positive Reviews: Cleanliness, nice breakfast, super nice management

-Commom hall had room near it so we couldnt keep the conversations and fun after 12 which is reasonable, but a hall should be open 24/7 and have no rooms , and it has no bin you litterally should go to the bin outside the hostel to throw trash  
-The air conditioning wasnt working and the windows had no handle to open them. But they were trying to fix it
